availability.p: Available with prior consent of the CELT programme for purposes of academic research and teaching only.

Copyright for the printed edition rests with the School of Celtic Studies, Dublin Institute for Advanced Studies, Dublin. The electronic edition was compiled with the kind permission of the copyright owner.

listBibl.head: The edition used in the digital edition

titleStmt.title: Book of Leinster, formerly Lebar na Núachongbála

samplingDecl.p: The present text represents pages 400–470 of the volume. The text of Táin Bó Cúailnge is available in a separate CELT file and has been omitted here. Editorial introduction, notes and indexes have also been omitted. Missing text supplied by the editor is tagged sup. Expansions to the text are marked ex.

correction.p: Text has been checked and proofread twice. All corrections and supplied text are tagged.

normalization.p: The electronic text represents the edited text.

segmentation.p: div0=the whole document; div1=the section; stanzas are marked lg.

interpretation.p: Names of persons (given names), and places are not tagged. Terms for cultural and social roles are not tagged.

profileDesc.creation: By Irish scribes in monastic scriptoria, based on older materials. 1150–1190

langUsage.language: The text is in Middle Irish.

change.item: Value of div0 "type" attribute modified, content of 'langUsage' checked; minor modifications made to header.
File proofed (2); markup adapted; more structural and content markup applied to file, header inserted from companion file.
File captured, basic xml markup applied.

div1.p:
Ropo &fdot;er amra airegda inti Conchobor mac Nessa Imráter
sunda for Ultaib. O máthair ro hainmniged .i. Ness ingen Echach Salbudi ríg Muman a mathairseom in Chonchobuir. Is airi dano ro ainmnigside Ness .i. Bátar da aiti déc ocá haltrom inna hingeni do réir Echach. Assa a ainmsi leosom i tossuch ar
ba hurussa a haltram. Fennid amnas i nHerind in tansin .i. Cathbad mac Rossa a ainm. Sech ba druiside ba fénnid. Luidside dī cuaird fénnidechta hi crícha Muman. Iss ed doralaside cona &fdot;éin do thig a haitisi .i. ingine Echach. Orta leis issind oenaidchi a da haite déc na ingine. &ersir; nicon fess cia ro ort in n-orggain.

Luid iarum iar suidiu ind ingen for fennidecht &ersir; gabais gaisced. &ersir; luide trib nonbaraib fo Herind. co ffessed nech ro marb a haiteda. &ersir; ro chrín na túatha. Is cumma nos crínad uili daig ni fitir sainriuth a bidbada. Ni hassa bith fria fodechtsa ol cách. Is desin ro boí Ní hassa fuirri. Luidsi dī for fiannas i cocrich nUlad.
Luidsi laa and dī a hoenur dia fothrucud. Conid tecma&ndot;g cucci in fennid cétna .i. intí Cathbad. Co tudchaidside eturru &ersir; cranna &ersir; ardagaib. Co 'mmanarnaic dóib. &ersir; co mbaísi do mnaí gradaigthe ocosom. &ersir; co mbert mac dó. Ba hé in mac hísin dī .i. Conchobor mac Cathbad. Ba caín tra a n-orddan ro genair i suidiu .i. intí
Conchobor. Deithbir són dano uair issind úair ro génair Crist iss and ro genairseom. Ro bátar .uii. fáthi oca thairchetul secht &mdot;bliadna riana genemain. No geinfed gein n-adamra la gein Crist forsin chloich ucut forsaro genair Conchobor &ersir; ropad irdairc a ainm i nHerind.,

BA mór a n-orddan do Chonchobur hi cind .uii. &mdot;bliadan iarna genemain iss and ro gab ríge &ndot;Ulad. Ba sí a thucaitside .i. boí Ness ingen Echach a mathairseom i n-oentama. Boí dano Fergus mac Rossa i rrígu Ulad. Adcobrastarside in mnaí .i. Ness do mnaí dó. Nathó ol sisi condom rab a log .i. ríge &mdot;bliadna
dom mac. Conid tairle nocon erbarthar mac ríg frim mac. Tabair ol cach &ersir; bid lat a rrige cia cho&ndot;garthar ainm ríge. Foid tra iar suidiu in ben la Fergus. &ersir; co&ndot;gairther ríge &ndot;Ulad do Chonchobur. Ro gab tra in ben for tinchosc a meicc &ersir; a aite &ersir; a muntire .i. lomrad indala fir &ersir; a thidnacul diaraile. &ersir; a hórsi &ersir; a hargat do thidnacul do
aradaib Ulad ar dáig iartaige dia mac.

Tanic dī cend na ree hísin dia bliadna. Dorimgart i suidiu Fergus a giallu. Immacallaim immi or Ulaid. Ro imraidsetar i n-oendáil. Ba dímicin mór leo Fergus dia tabairt hi tindscra. Roptar buidig i&mmacr; do Chonchobur ara degthidnacul dóib. Ba sí
i&mmacr; a n-immacallam anro rir Fergus scarad dó friss. Anro chennaig Conchobor anad aici.
Iss and sin tra ro scar Fergus fri ríge &ndot;Ulad. &ersir; ‖ iss and sin tra ro gaired ardrige choicid Herend do Chonchobur mac Cathbad.,

Ba mór ind airmitiu tra doratsat Ulaid do Chonchobur. Ba
si a airmitiu ám leo .i. cech fer di Ultaib doberad ingin macdacht a feiss la Conchobor in chetaidchi combad hé a cétmunter. Ni rabai for talmain gein bad gaíthi.u. Nocho ruc breith ríam uair nocho léicthe do. fo bíth na rucad gubreith. napdis messaiti a thorthi. Ni rabi dano forsin talmain caur ba tressiu. &ersir; ni reilced
ríam i n-eislind .i. do airichill meic ind ríg. No bítís cauraid &ersir; arsidi catha &ersir; láith gaile ara bélaib hi cathaib &ersir; immaircib arnabad eslind dó. Cech fer do Ultaib dobered aidchi n-oegidechta. fess dó lia mnaíside in n-aidchisin.

Cóiciur ar trib fichtib ar .ccc. ina thegluch Conchobuir .i. a llín
laa bís issin bliadain iss é lín fer no bíd hi tegluch Conchobuir. Commaid i&mmacr; no bíd eturru. .i. fer cech n-aidchi dia mbiathad. Is and i&mmacr; ticed in fer toesech in biatta in n-aidchiIsin hi cind bliadna doridisi. Nirbo bec i&mmacr; in biathad .i. mucc &ersir; ag &ersir; dabach do cach &fdot;ir. No bítis fir is taig i&mmacr; nach faerad sain. .i. Fergus mac Roig
amal adfiadar. Masu &fdot;ír ba húais a méit .i. in t⋅echta Fergusa nibu comthi.h la nech n-aile .i. Secht traigid etera ó &ersir; a beolo. &ersir; uii. n-artim etera da ⋅úil. &ersir; .uii. n-artim na sróin. &ersir; uii. n-artim inna bélaib. Lán coid méich fliuchad a chind coa &fdot;olcad. Secht n-artim na luirg. Bolg méich ina thistu. Secht mna dia ergaire
mani thairsed Flidais. Secht mucca &ersir; uii. &ndot;dabcha &ersir; uii. n-aige do chathim dó. &ersir; nert .dcc. and. Ba hecen dosum dī sechtmain do biathad in teglaich sech cach. Conchobor i&mmacr; fessin no gaibed in samuin dóib fo dagin terchomraic in t⋅lúaig móir. Ba hecen in tsochaide mór do airichill. fo bith cech fer do Ultaib na tairchebad
aidchi samna dochum nEmna. no gatta ciall de &ersir; focherte a &fdot;ert &ersir; a lecht &ersir; a lie arnabarach. Airichill mór di for Conchobor. No noisigthe leis na tri lae ria samain. &ersir; na tri laa iar samain fri tomailt i tig Conchobuir. Ba caín dano in tegdas. Tri tigi la Conchobor .i. in Chroebrúad &ersir; in Téite Brecc. &ersir; in Chroibderg. Issin
Chroebdeirg. no bítis in chennal &ersir; na fuidb. Issin Chroebruaid i&mmacr; no bitís na rríg .i. ba rúad dono rígaib. Isin Teiti Bricc dano no bítis na gae &ersir; na scéith &ersir; na claidib .i. ba brecc do imdornchoraib na claideb n-orduirn. &ersir; do chainnlig na &ndot;glasgae cona muncib &ersir; cona fithib óir &ersir; argait &ersir; do lannaib &ersir; imthimchellaib na ⋅cíath
di ór &ersir; argut. &ersir; do intindrim dano na n-escra &ersir; na corn &ersir; na mbaiglend.
Is airi no bertís a n-arma uadib i n-oentech. Cech ní gargg

rochluintís mani roistís dígail fair fo chetóir. Atraiged cech fer dialailiu combid cach díb oc tuarcain a chind &ersir; a scéith ‖ for a
cheiliu sethnón in taige. co mbertis a n-arma uadib uile isin Teite &mdot;Brecc. Ind Ochoin Chonchobuir and .i. sciath Conchobuir. cethri imle óir impe. &ersir; Fuban Con Culaind. &ersir; Lamthapad Conaill Chernaig. &ersir; ind Óchnech &Fdot;lidais. &ersir; ind Orderg &Fdot;urbaide. &ersir; in Choscrach Causcraid. &ersir; ind Echtach Amairgin. &ersir; ind Ír Chondere.
&ersir; in Chaindel Nuadat. &ersir; ind Leochain &Fdot;ergusa. &ersir; ind Uathach Dubthaig. &ersir; ind Lettach Errgi. &ersir; in Brattach Mind. &ersir; ind Luithech Noisen. &ersir; ind Nithach Loegaire. &ersir; in Chroda Chormaic. &ersir; in Sciatharglan Senchada. &ersir; in Chomla Chatha Cheltchair. Moo turim dano anro boí do sciathaib and olchena.

Mor n-orddain dano &ersir; ániusa &ersir; alluda &ersir; aurdarcais. in teglachsa Conchobuir. Cenco beth do thren&fdot;eraib &ersir; chauradaib and chetmus. acht Fergus mac Róig ba lór do chalmataid. in fer atacomai&ndot;g na teora Formaela Mide. i cath Gárige for Táin Bó Cualnge .i. teora builli dorat forsin talmain o doánic a &fdot;erg fri
Conchobor co filet na trí cnuiccsin and béus &ersir; merait and co bráth. Cenco beth do gasciud and acht Conall Cernach mac Amargin Iar&ndot;giunnaig ba lór fri immarbáig .i. ond úair gabais gaí inna láim ni rabi cen guin duini cech lai do Chonnachtaib &ersir; argain fri daigid cech n-aidchi. &ersir; nar chotail riam cen chend Connachtaig
foa glún. Ni rabi i nHerind ferand boairig forsna rubad Conall Cernach guin duine. Is é ám Conall Cernach ro rand muicc Meic Da Thó ar comram gascid ar belaib láth gaile fer &ndot;Herend. Fer ro diglastar Ultu for firu Herend .i. do neoch díb ro marbad &ersir; mairfither co bráth. Fer na dechaid assa noendin o gabais gai
inna láim.

ubullchless &ersir; faeborchless &ersir; faenchless &ersir; cless clettinech. &ersir; tetchless &ersir; corpchless &ersir; ich n-erred. &ersir; cor &ndot;deiled. &ersir; léim dar néim. &ersir; filliud
erred nair. &ersir; gai bolga &ersir; bai brassi. &ersir; rothchless &ersir; ótar. &ersir; cless for analaib. &ersir; bruud gine &ersir; sían curad. &ersir; beim co commus &ersir; tathbéim &ersir; réim fri fogaist co ndirgud chrette fora rind co fornaidm niad.

Moo turim i&mmacr; teglaig Conchobuir. &ersir; turim a thigi. ‖ .i. tri choicait imdád is tig. &ersir; teora lanamna in cach imdai. Stiall archopur do
derggibur a teg &ersir; na imdada. Imdai Conchobuir for lár in taige. Airinig creduma impe. co mbarridaib argit. &ersir; eoin óir forsna hairenchaib. &ersir; gemma do liic lógmair it e súli no bítis ina cennaib. Slatt argait uas Chonchobur &ersir; teora ubla óir &fdot;urri. fri tinchosc in t⋅lúaig. &ersir; in tan no chroithed no thurcbad son a gotha fessin. no
thoad in sluag &ersir; ce dofaidsad snathat for lar in taige rocluinfide lasin tuí i mbítis ar airmitinsom. Tricha láth &ndot;gaile i n-imdai Chonchobuir fri ól. Ol &ndot;guala .i. dabach Geirg for lár in tige bithlán. Is í thucad a Glind Gergg diar ort Gerg la Conchobor. Fer frithalma more is taig .i. Bricriu mac Carbada .ix. meic Carbada
Uill is taig. .i. Glaine &ersir; Gormainech. Mane Minscoth. &ersir; Ailill Duress. &ersir; Ret &ersir; Bricriu. Fer nemnech drochthengthach in Bricriu. Ba lór do neim dó dia &ndot;gabad forsin rúin no bid fora menmain no ássad bolgg corcra assa etun &ersir; ba metithir ferdorn. Co n-apradsom fri Conchobor mebais din boilgg innocht a Chonchobuir. Mór tra
do daínib i&ndot;gantaib ro batar i taig Conchobuir fon innasain ...

head.sup: Aided Guill meic Carbada &ersir; Aided Gairb Glinne Rigi

div1.p:
GEssa &ersir; ilberta bítis for Coin Culaind for clothmaccaem Croebruade. for mac sethar Conchobuir for lígbratanach Line for buageltach &mdot;Breg. Batar íat a geisi. A ⋅lonniud do óenlaech. traig fordail di chonair ria comlund oen&fdot;ir. Comlund
do opa do oen&fdot;ir. Techt i ndáil cen airiasacht. techt ra oenlaech dochum dala. Feiss eter mná cen &fdot;iru ocaib. geiss dó commaid la mnai. geiss dó grian d'ergi fair i nEmain Macha acht combad é atressed rempe.

Fecht n-oen atraacht i nEmain i tus laí ria &ndot;gréin. Atbert fria
araid carpait. Maith a mo phopa Laeg ar Cu Chulaind. fetar na fil it menmain ar Laeg. Cid son ar Cu Chulaind. na eich do gabail &ersir; in carpat do innell. ed em ar Cu Chulaind. ar iss ed ar Laeg ni toil dot gasciud iss indilti in carpat. is gabtha ind echrad. Tair dī dit charpat. Atraaacht Cu Chulaind. Cid leth
na mochaergi ar Conchobor. Cian uad a mo phopa chaem Conchobuir ona lud do chur chuardda im Murthemniu. &ersir; is digraiss lend techt indiu. Nadba cian ind aurnaide duit a meic ar Conchobor. ar is mitharba lend cach main &ersir; cach maith it i&ndot;gnais.

Luid Cu Chulaind dia charput iar tain. Tarblai&ndot;g na charput
chobsaid chomerma. Saigis Láeg brot forin n-echraid. Snedis slaitt i cend seta &ersir; imthechta. Rancatar rempu co Athis Murthemni. Maith a Laeg ar Cu Chulaind is oebind in dindgnasa. Deithbir son ar Laeg. daig is gle muir o ⋅und. &ersir; ro raid na briathra. &ersir; dorone laid

lg.l: Ni fubai dam a laech laind.
Is iarom sain fath cen gaí.

div1.p:
Maith a Laeg fodail in n-echraid &ersir; discuir in carpat ar bith contulind mo laem cotulta. Uair is dom gessib techt co hEmain
cen chomlund. Scuris Laeg in carpat &ersir; tascrais ind echraid. Ocus dérgis fortgemne in carpait foa. &ersir; dobert fuan corcra cortharach taris &ersir; cendadart clúmdaide fo chind. &ersir; tul.is Cu Chulaind a laem cotulta. Bai Laeg ic foraire &ersir; ic forcomét do.

Níba cían dó ic forcomet mara &ersir; tíri co n-acca in curach n-adbal
no bruinned dochum tíre. Metithir óen na prim⋅liab in chorr thuisech din churuchsin. &ersir; ba haidbliu leis. in chorr aile. Adbliu leis co mmór oldás gesca ralach rodírge os &fdot;ult &fdot;idbaide in laech-

seiss for braine in churaig. Da rámma do iurn aithlegtha i ndib lamaib dó ic tescad in mara immi sain chan. No rannad bledmila
in mara immi do bressaib na ruadrama súas i n-ardda clethi. co tuittitis i frithdrui&ndot;g na conaire cetna a dochum co mbítis ar medon in churaig. Co tibedsom a ma&ndot;g&fdot;áitbiud gaire for aird impu. co ndigsed tre⋅ess cona nirt nonbair dar ginchráes dó. Comtar écnaig a thruim &ersir; a glainene for ettegail dar commur a chraes &ersir; a bráget.
Samla beolo fidchuaich indara súil dó fria chind dianechtair. acht mod ma 'dresed corr in t⋅úil anaill do ind a grúade. Samalta comchubrech daim amríata cech finna sescnidi imluathi acarb sinis tria fortrennaib a chrúadchind fri fonascad &ndot;gaíthe. Baí dano Láeg coa thuarascbail &ersir; tairderc for aird. &ersir; dorone in laed.

lg.l: mó do ócaib Gaedel is Gall;
Sciath aca ar lár a ethair
fo tailfed dag ni gó dam.
nach fuiciub in mag met glond.
co fesser in me a chomlond. ‖
in laech atchiu sin churoch. A.

div1.p:
Maith a Loeg insaig in laech n-ucut na n-iarfaig moa chrích &ersir; moa genelach &ersir; a ainm &ersir; a atharthír &ersir; cia dú consaige. Luid dano a dochum &ersir; tarrasair forin phurt cind chomair dó. Can
lod a mórlaech ar Laeg. ni labair dano fri sin co Láeg. Can lod a laech móir fil isin churuch ar Laeg. Niro labair beus. Atbert Laeg in tress fecht. Can lod a laech móir. cia th'ainm &ersir; t'atharthir. c'airet imrecaim do ⋅et. Dogénsa mo ⋅lonnniud duit ar atchiu is delb arad fort. &ersir; menbad sin nithó. Dena dī ar Láeg
ar iss ed connagam fort. Goll mac Carbad mac ríg na Germane tuascertaige don domun. Triur brathar ataam .i. Goll &ersir; Cromm &ersir; Rig. Ocus focherdsam crandchur immna teoraib insib .i. im inis Bretan. im inis Danmarg. im Herind. Mo chrandsa dano taet ass ar tús. dosbert for Herind. Atbiursa mo dee ar Láeg is
cétcrand co torud chraind dedenaig. Maith a gillai ar Goll cia coa mbí. Cosind laech ucut arin tulaig i mmedón in maigi ar do chi. Cia conseiss in tulaig n-ucut ar Goll. Cu Chulaind mac Sualtaim sund do &fdot;eraib Herend ar Laeg. Atchualammar in láech &mdot;becsin ar Goll. ráid friss arco tí coragba mo chor &ersir; mo thuarastas
&ersir; arco fargbur errige Herend frí. laim fessin leiss. Meni thoga anísin .i. bith formu chur &ersir; mo thur collad a Herind sechtair. Dolluid Laeg a dochum Con Culaind. Ocus iarfaigid Cu Chulaind dó. cúich in suut. Goll mac Carbada. &ersir; ro innis uile aní remi

connici collad a Herind sechtair. Maith a Laeg na n-insaig doridisi
&ersir; ráid friss na gaibed i n-airiur do airireraib Herend din chursa. &ersir; nad gaibed cocrích nUlad a n-ed beorsa i nHerind. Dothaet i frithdrui&ndot;g na sliged cetna. &ersir; adfét a aithesc. Maith aile a Guill atbert in laech ucut isin tulaig fritt. na taisc do churach co calad do chaladaib Herend in n-ed bessum i mbethaid. &ersir; na taise dochum
nUlad in t⋅ainruth.

La sodain dobert Goll band feramail fora churach co 'mmarossed dar noí sessaib i tír tírim. Tanic Laeg i rroí madma do innaigid Con Culaind. Dothaet Cu Chulaind do ⋅aigid Guill. foróbair cach díb ic folmaisi gona araile. Luathium luis Goll a láma.
Gabais Coin Culaind dara armu no n-imnais eter a láim &ersir; a thoeb ar ammus a churaig. Maith a ⋅iriti a ⋅iabairthe a hebarchaim. luid torut mar tháet bó dar láeg. Vot chur mar churait idain mna. Rot naisc mar nasces idu feda. Rot tregdastar mar thregdas fadb omnaid. Ro tuairgestar mar thuargther íasc
for ganmig. Rot ⋅nigestar niar negar a lundu. Is litiud meic bic dia scamun dorone in laechsin dít. ‖ Ni &fdot;uil do dluig do gasced ɫ dot tarim eter dagóco Herend dind lóso. Colla dom inchaib ní mó na mo chumlond féin in fersin.

Bidgais Cu Chulaind co 'mmarossed dar noí n-immarib on Gull
sechtair. Ni roacht o Gull tascud ɫ tincur dind &fdot;ót forsa mbaí. co li&ndot;gis Cu Chulaind mar cach n-ethait a haeraib co seiss for bil scéith in Guill. Dobert Goll fochrothad dá uilind fon scíath co roacht band &fdot;ata úad. Indara fecht li&ndot;gis Cu Chulaind for bil in scéith chetna. &ersir; nochtais in Cruadín Catutchend .i. a chlaideb.
Cumma no gabad chloich &ersir; crand &ersir; cnáim. Dobert béim do Gull co tall in cend i comarda a muniuil de. &ersir; dobert athbéim ina médi conid i n-oen&fdot;echt condráncatar a da gabait chliss dochum talman. &ersir; dobert in tress co ndergenai da n-ordain de. &ersir; no facband amlaid- sin. &ersir; atbert na briathra &ersir; ro ráid in laed.

lg.l: Cend Guill seo atchí im láim a Laech.
conid é a chend so atchi im láim. .C.

div1.p:
Maith a Laeg ar Cu Chulaind aig brot forin n-echraid &ersir; sneid slaitt forru. Cia dú són ar Laeg. Co Emain móir Macha ar Cu Chulaind. Dia nernta form ni ragmais o Dún Delga &ersir; ó ingin &Fdot;orgaill. Cid duit a Láeg na forcuala a n-atbert mo phopa
Conchobor i tús laí indiu. Bec do grád la Conchobor ar Láeg. acht co mbethi ri gleicc &ersir; ri gliaid dar cend a chuicid. Fó leiss ciano thiasta ass. fó leiss cenco tiasta. Mad fír duit anísin ar Cu Chulaind bamsa deorad dar crích nUlad fri bliadain &ersir; ni &fdot;uigbet Ulaid mo greim. Mád gó i&mmacr; bát innarbthach féin uamse &ersir; nibat
munter dam ár ní miad lim mo ara do marbad.

Imthúsa Con Culaind ni ⋅ed iss innisti sunna colléic acht imthúsa Con aill meic Gleo Glaiss a Cual&ndot;ge. Briuga cetach atacomnaic. Tarmchemnigid remi .lll. carpdech co hEmain Macha i tús laí. Aill bruitt budi. aill bruitt deirg. aill bruitt úane. aill bruitt gorma.
aill bruitt chorcra. aill bruitt duba. And seiss Conchobor for rubu na rígrátha fri hEmuin immuich. co mmathib Ulad imme. for forodmaig na hEmna.

Mo chen mo chen a Chonaill meic Gleo Glaiss ar Conchobor. Is ed conairnecmar ar Conall. Atetha samlaid ar Conchobor.
Nithó ar Conall. acht fled mórchain tarclamad limsa duitsiu. A tochathium ‖ damsa ar Conchobor. Cia lín ludfamar ar Conchobor. Ulaid fir sceo mnaib maccaib ingenaib feib amal connís ar Conall. ar dia mbetís eter biu &ersir; marbu Ulaid i n-oenbali atethaidís leór a llessaigthi fri bliadain láin limsa ic Dún Cholptha i Cualngiu.

Gabtar far n-eich a Ultu &ersir; indliter far carpait ar Conchobor. Ro gabait echrad Ulad &ersir; ro indlit a carpait. Táncatar mathi Ulad .i. damrad dermór cóicid Herend meic ríg &ersir; ruirech &ersir; amus &ersir; ócthigern. &ersir; gillarad chass crodund in choicid. &ersir; macra.da &ersir; bantrochta cáemchendchassa chuicid Ulad. aindre &ersir; ingenrada &ersir;
maccaeme. glámma &ersir; clíara. fiallach ciúil &ersir; airfitid. fir denma drecht &ersir; nath &ersir; admolta Ulad. Comeirgset i nn-oen&fdot;echt a hEmain samlaid. Senchaide &ersir; brithemain &ersir; echlacha &ersir; obláire &ersir; forb&fdot;ir &ersir; ónmiti &ersir; grácberthaig.

Tancatar Ulaid uile i n-oenchonair im Chonchobor. And atbert
Conall roga ar díb conairib lim duit a rí chuicid Herend. Cia da chonair ón ar Conchobor. Conar réid &fdot;ota. ɫ conar garit amréid. In chonar garit amreid ar Conchobor. luid dar formna laí acht súail. Ni &fdot;ail do amréid inti ar Conall acht Garb Glinni Rige. Ni nGlend Rige tiagait na slúaig ar Conchobor acht i Slíab &Fdot;úait
cach remdirgi. Ni &fdot;ácbam mo chonair la Garb Rige tria bithu ar Conchobor. Niro rathaig in Garb na sluaig do dul secha co cuala culgaire na carpat fo deoid. Luid Garb fo deired na slúag conascar .l. láech díb assa carptib. Fosrimmart i ngonaib &ersir; i crobuillib báis do methescul derid in t⋅lóig.

Dolluid Conchobor co tech Conaill meic Gleo Glaiss co Dún Colptha i Cualngiu. Ro frithalit na slúaig &ersir; na sochaide ar dánaib ar grádaib ar dligedaib. ar úasli ar chaínbésaib do neoch badas tadas fínaib firmathi. Ro esráit tigi ardda urgbaidi do aín &ersir; do úrlúachair &ersir; do cholcthib clúmdaide. &ersir; cach neich bad comtig do
mathib Ulad dia frithálim fri i mbrudin bronn&fdot;arsi&ndot;g bélscailti Conaill meic Gleo Glaiss in n-aidchisin. Maith a rí chúcid Herend a Chonchobuir inro dál nech dit muntir itíaid innocht. Niro dál ar Conchobor do neoch ro fácbus i nEmain. Cid són ar Conchobor. Coro oslaicther din choinse imdeglas in lethtrichait
chet .i. do Chonbél. Is é nar n-airend ar chuirib ar chobdenaib echtrannaib. Iar sin ro oslaiced do Chonbél.

Tucait airigthe bíd &ersir; lenna dona sluagaib iar sin. &ersir; dorónait gretha glan&fdot;othraicthe dóib assa aithle. Fliuchcaemna folcthi &ersir; fothraicthe. Ro figdírged a canuch cetamuin do cach laech fo
leith. Dobert cúachsnaidm curad ar cach laech fo leith. Tucait na dáer &ersir; na dorsaire do &fdot;aire na cathrach iar tam. Ro tasselbad a llind &ersir; a mbiad do Ultaib i n-áitt oenbale. Ro dáiled mid mesc medarchaín forsna sluagaib ‖ a cuachaib a cornaib a coplestraib.

Imthús na slúag iss ed iss innisti sund colléic. acht tarrasatar
ac ól &ersir; ic oebinnius. Imthusa Chon Culaind i&mmacr; maith a Laeg cuir m cend sin carpat &ersir; aig brot forin n-echraid &ersir; do dait co hEmain. Lotar rempu. Ba samla fri crích in da chlod dori&ndot;gensat roith iarnaide carpait Con Culaind in lásin do thaebaib na sliged. Ba samalta ri helta dubén ic snigi dar mag moradbal. ina curtis na
eich do cheppaib &ersir; do chorr&fdot;ótaib &ersir; di &fdot;uatnib talman asa n-aigthib síar sechtair fri fonascad &ndot;gaithe. Ba samalta fri eill &ndot;géisi ic snige dar mag móradbal ana curtis rempu d'uanfadaig dar glomraigib a srían. Ba s amla ri diaid do rigbruidin in dendgur &ersir; ind análfadach &ersir; in smútgur. ar tressa na hérma dobert Laeg mac
Riangabra ar da n-echaib Con Culaind in lásin.

Dofarnaic reme co faidchi na Emna fon samlaidsin. Maith a Laeg ar Cu Chulaind indar lim is fás ind Emainse thall innocht. Cid dia fil lat sin ar Laeg. Ar ní chlunim gáir ɫ gretha inti ar Cu Chulaind. Ni chlunim gáir echlach ɫ boccmell sluaig ɫ tarcon
turusa inti. Ni chlunim gáir chiuil ɫ airfiti inti. Fosta latt éssi fostada th' echraidi co ndigsa dia &fdot;is cia teidm tethra dothait forsna sluagu. Fostaid Laeg ind echrad. &ersir; luid Cu Chulaind i nEmain. Is é cétlaech dorala dó i nEmain Súanan Salcend rannaire Conchobuir. Ar ní &fdot;acbad a rannaire féin Emain do grés.
Maith a &Sdot;úanain cid lotar na sluaig. Co tech Conaill meic Gleo Glaiss i Cualngiu ar Suanan. Inrom imraidse Conchobor ritsu ar Cu Chulaind. Ni chualammar ar Suanan. Is fír a n-adbert Láeg. nad fil mo gradsa la Conchobor. Atbiur mo brethir na bia Emain feib amal conairnecus. nodas ber i corthair tened. Ni bia
éludach esti. ɫ óen di éis oirgni. Dá ní no thairmescad Choin Culaind do grés .i. cichi &ersir; aurbrunne ban do thasbenad dó. ɫ raind espai &ersir; airchetail cachnaitis fiadu. Ro gab ecla inti Súanan &ersir; cachain rand.

lg.l: Mo chen a Chu Chulaind chruaid
Mo chen fort fein fichtib tor.
mo chen ar Dechtir mét rath.
Na bí ic imthecht na hoidche.
airis i fus is mo chen. M.

div1.p:
Níra chomaill Cu Chulaind trá anro thingell .i. Emain do loscud acht tánic ar cúl immach. Maith a Laeg aig brot forin n-echraid dó rún co tech Conaill meic Gleo Glaiss i Cualngiu dáig iss ed lotar na sluaig &ersir; Conchobor. Dia ndernta form ar in gilla ni ragmais
a hEmain innocht. dered dind ló. Cromm barr cráeb. ísel cithar fidbad. ro laig fíad i fórib. salaig cretta carpat. lesc ri fomóir cumscugud. ni tráth imlúate echraide. Níram irgaire ar Cu Chulaind. Nitho ar in gilla. Roga ar da conair ‖ lim duit conar &fdot;ota réid ɫ conar fota amréid. In garit amréid ar Cu Chulaind.
Ni &fdot;il d'amreid inti ar Laeg acht Garb Glinni Rige. Ní &fdot;ácbaini mo chonair la óenláech ar Cu Chulaind.

Luid Cu Chulaind reme i cend séta. Co cuala in feólbéim issin glind ba nessam dó .i. i &ndot;Glind Rige anro thascair reme in Garb do sluagaib Ulad. Luid Cu Chulaind fon feolbéim. Co n-ecmamg
comlund dó &ersir; Garb Glinne Rige. Ro gab cách díb guin &ersir; airlech araile dona slegaib slemunchruadib. Facsit la Coin Culaind dond imbualad ɫ dond imrubad. Lecis a ⋅leig úad &ersir; gabais a láim &ersir; dobert crothad cotud furri condas tuc á gualaind cona slinnén. Léicis Garb Glinne Rige a iachtad écomlaind ar aird. I fail nech
beo sund ar Láeg. Am beósa ar Cu Chulaind &ersir; domroched mo chlaideb. Dobert Laeg dó in claideb. Nochtais Cu Chulaind in Cruadin Catutchend co tuc béim don Garb co topacht in dá cend bátar fora óenméidiu de &ersir; dobert athbeim dó ina médi conid i n-oen&fdot;echt ráncatar a da gabait chliss for talmain &ersir; tuc in tress
buille dó co nderna dá n-orddain de. Maith ar Láeg cinnas comlaind. In n-ed bam beó ticfa frim ar Cu Chulaind &ersir; dorigne in laed.

lg.l: dom leith chle &ersir; dom leith dess;
is eol dam na mbiad duit de

div1.p:
Cuir in da chend a Laeg issin carpat &ersir; saig brot forin n-echraid
&ersir; dó romaind co tech Conaill meic Gleo Glaiss i Cualngiu. bid fír for Laeg. Tancatar rempu i sligedaig saethair co torachtatar in n-abaind i fail tige Conaill. frisi nn-abar Aband Cholpthai i Cualngiu. Mór ind aband ar Cu Chulaind. Domroched fertas mo charpait coro &fdot;romur in n-áth riasinn echraid. Atchuala Conbél
cú Conaill fúaim ind usci fri formnaib in míled. Oslaicis a ginchráes &ersir; atnaig a gloim n-archon for aird. co ndigsed treess dar ginchraes dó. Dobert Cu Chulaind in fertais na gin &ersir; a laim &ersir; gabais a thrommu &ersir; no n-imnaisc mo chend feib imnaiscther lathranna staible co nderna briscbrúar dia chnámaib na chroccund &ersir; dobert
urchur uad de ó abaind Cholpthai i Cualngiu co Belut. conid de atá Belut forsin chloich fora torchair Conbél cú Conaill meic Gleo Glaiss.

Dothaet reme co dorus na cathrach. Apair oslucud remut a Laeg &ersir; na raid missi and. acht apair gnáthmaccáem do maccáemaib
na hEmna ‖

Dothaet Láeg co dorus na cathrach. Oslaicid a dorsaire. Cia condnaig in n-urslucud. maccaem do maccaemnaib na hEmna sund ar Laeg. Ni uasalgen i nEmain intí ná tanic in fleidsea cosin trathsa. &ersir; naro cumniged im biad ɫ im lind. d'oslucud remi
dia tísed sund. Na radid a mogadu. borb &ersir; anseirc i&ndot; mac fil sund. Atberum ar &mdot;brethir ar na dorsairi in maccaem dia tucsat

Ulaid i n-áitt oenbaile brón &ersir; tár &ersir; tarcusul na ticfa co solustráth éirge imbárach isin cathraig co tuca cách aichni for araile. Rochuala Cu Chulaind in guthsain. Ocus gallán clochi boí forsin
&fdot;aichthi. A thrian i talmain &ersir; a da trían uasa. dofúargaib fria ais &ersir; tarlaic a urchur dar &fdot;iartharsna ind imdorais coro briss in dunad &ersir; coro marb .lll. mogad batar ic frithalim na sluag na ranic fer maíti airgni úad innund. Ro nocht a chlaideb &ersir; dothaet is tech darna sluagaib &ersir; a chlaideb frithnocht leis. Cona rathaig fer
dotheing dúaig diarbo chomainm Bricriu mac Carbad Uill di Ultaib. &ersir; doroni in rand.

lg.l: In láech i fail in t-arm láim.
ma cach mairer sund co se.
Is eol dam na mbia duít de.
Mairg ro raid a brethir móir.
mad dia ndig for culu de.

div1.p:
Cia airm i tát francai&ndot;ais mo thige ar Conchobor. Senoll Uathad.
Bruchur a Bruachairne. Sescnén mac Forduib Mani Lámgarb. Cia airm i tát mo meicse ar Fergus. Buinne Find. &ersir; Illand Ilair cland. Cia airm i tát meic Uisnig. Noísi &ersir; Ánle &ersir; Arddán. Maith ar Conall cia airm i tát mo brathirse. comérgid &ersir; co&ndot;gnaid fri Coin Culaind.

Atragat na sluaig. Ro baí fe 'nund &ersir; fe anall in dúsin. essgal &ersir; tessgal. rocloss fúarg&fdot;othrom na sluag i céin. Atraacht Sencha iar tain &ersir; ro chroth in cráeb sída ósna sluagaib combtar sídaig amal betis meic oenathar &ersir; óenmathar. Ra coraigit a scéith fora ndelgnaib. a claidbe fora n-adartaib. &ersir; a slega fora n-adlennaib.
Tánic cách na inad óil. ‖ Dobreth Cu Chulaind a chlaideb na &fdot;intech. Ro gab flesc findairgit &ersir; dobreth béim di i mmulluch Conchobuir o bun irlai co clais a chuil. Díambad áil dam ar se is é in claideb dobéraind &ersir; ni &fdot;ail do slogaib ocut lín t'anacail menbádat aite &ersir; brathair máthar.

Tánic Conall Cernach &ersir; Fergus. dobrethsat póca do Choin Culaind &ersir; ra fucsat leo dind &fdot;ochlai &fdot;ennida. Tancas ó Chonchobur na díaid co n-airdig meda i llestur argait óengil dó co mbethaid &ersir; slánti ónd ríg. Tanic Laeg immach fiadna sluagaib &ersir; fuachais dí chúalle. &ersir; dobreth cend Guill for indara cualle. &ersir; da cend Gairb
Glinni Rigi arin cuailli aile. Maith a Laeg ar Conchobor cia cend in cend attnech acarb mór út. Cend Guill meic Carbada ar Láeg meic ríg na Germane tuascertaige in domain. co&ndot;arnaic dó fri Coin Culaind ar Áth Mór i mMaig Murthemni. Niba Áth Mór a ainm ondiu co bráth ar Athirne acht Áth &ndot;Guill. Conid de atá
Áth &ndot;Guill fri Dún Delga anís. Cit n-é dá chend in da chend út forind oenmuníul ar Conchobor. Da cend Gairb Glinne Rige ar
Láeg. Atlochur dom chumachtaib ar Conchobor. Ro thascair .l. do deriud na sluag ic tiachtain secha.

Mo chen do thichtu a Chu Chulaind ar Conall mac Gleo Glaiss.
Ro gelcais do láma isin chathraig i tanacais innocht. Cia holc daróne ar Conchobor. Trí choicait mogad bátar ic frithalim na sluag rodos marb d'óenurchur don gallán chloche ambúaruch. Nach baí cú maith latsu ar Laeg. Ní raba i nHerind acht cú na cerdda coin bad &fdot;err oldás ar Conall Cernach. Fuil culén dó
limsa níba ferr a athair oldás. doberthar duitsiu do inchaib Con Culaind. Doberthar .lll. mogad uaimsi ar Conchobor dar cend aigthe Con Culaind.

Fessatar co cend trí cóicthiges and i tig Conaill meic Gleo Glaiss. Ba hé sescend a n-oigidechta a cetadaig &ersir; niba hí ind adaig
dedenach.

Tancatar na sluaig co hEmain asa aithle. And atbert Cu Chulaind fri Laeg. Aig brot fora n-echraid &ersir; sneid slaitt forru. &ersir; do duit co tech Eogain meic Durthacht co fosud fer Fernmaige. co fargbam in coiced fri bliadain conna faccara nech di choiciud
Ulad ar n-agid fri bliadain airm innar n-imdergad. Maith a meic ar Conchobor niba fír anísin. Atetha breth do bél féin duit. Ni géb mo breth féin ar Cu Chulaind acht breth bertait brithemain &ersir; filid in chuicid. Tucait aes dána Ulad ar leth. &ersir; is sí breth rucsat screpul cacha ⋅róna. unga cacha cathri. ech aigenmais cacha grega.
Screpul cacha bóbotha. mucc mucríme cach treóit. Cumal cacha cathrach. Ro maith Cu Chulaind a dá trían sain dá aiti &ersir; dá thigernu &ersir; do brathair a mathar. Dorat a trían n-aill dar cend a einich do &fdot;iledaib in chuicid. Combad marthanach in echtrasin dó mar cach n-echtra dochuaid riam. Ocus in mochergisin mar
cach mochergi.
Conid hísin Aided Guill meic Carbada &ersir; Aided Gairb Glinne Rige.,

div1.head: Incipit Scel Mucci Meic Da Thó.
div1.p:
BOí rí amra for Laignib .i. Mac Da ,Thó a ainm. Bui cú oca.
No ditned in cu Lagniu uile. Ailbe ainm in chon. ‖ &ersir; lán Heriu dia aurdarcus. Tancas o Ailill &ersir; o Meidb do chungid in chon. I n-oenuair dano tancatar &ersir; techta Conchobuir meic Nessa do chungid in chon chetna. Ro ferad failte friu uile. &ersir; ructha chucisium isin &mdot;bruidin. Is ísein in t⋅essed bruiden ro
boí i nHerind in tansin .i. bruden Da Derga i crích Cualand. &ersir; bruden &Fdot;orgaill Manaich. &ersir; bruden Meic Da Reo i mBrefni. &ersir; bruden Da Choca i n-iarthur Mide. &ersir; bruden Blai Briuga i nUltaib. Secht &ndot;doruis isin bruidin. &ersir; uii. sligeda tréthi. &ersir; .uii. tellaige inti. &ersir; .uii. core. &ersir; dam &ersir; tinne in cach coire. In &fdot;er dotheiged
iarsin t⋅ligi dobered in n-ael isin coire. &ersir; na tabrad don chetgabail iss ed no ithed. Mani thucad ní don chéttadall ni bered a n-aill. Ructha trá na techta na imdai chucisium do airiuc thuile doib riasin feiss. Ro raidset a n-athes Do chungid in chon dodechammarni ó Ailill &ersir; ó Meidb ar tecta Connacht. &ersir; dobertar
tri fichit cét lilgach a chetóir. &ersir; carpat &ersir; da ech bas &fdot;err la Connachta. &ersir; a chommaín i cind bliadna cenmotha sin. Dia chungid dano dodechammarni ar tecta Ulad o Chonchobur. &ersir; ni messo Conchobor do charait. &ersir; dano do thabairt sét &ersir; indile. &ersir; doberthar a chomméit cétna i cind bliadna. &ersir; biaid degcaratrad de.

Ro lá dī i socht mór intí Mac Da Thó. Co rrabi tri thráth cen dig cen biad. cen chotlod. acht co immorchor ón taib co araile. Is and ro ráid a ben riss. Is fota in troscud i taí. atá biad lat cenco n-essara. cid no taí. Ni tharat frecra forin mnaí. conid and ro ráid in ben.

lg.l: do Mac Da Thó co thech;
In ben Asoí dosoí uaim fri fraig
ni thardda do rún do mnaib;
.In fer. Cú Mes Roida meic Da Thó
dofaeth mór fer find fria rath
is derb bid mogda in gním;
bas mó do buaib na do thír.
nicon fes cia o tucad. T.

div1.p:
Iar sin atraacht suas &ersir; no mbertaigedar. Bad maith dún tra ol se &ersir; dona haigedaib dodnancatar. Anaitside leis trí laa &ersir; trí aidche. &ersir; hairmtgr chuci fo leith techta Connacht. Ro bása tra ar se i n-im⋅nim mor &ersir; cuntabairt móir coro glé dam .i. doratusa
in coin do Ailill &ersir; do Meidb. &ersir; tecat ar cend in chon co sochraid &ersir; ros bia lind &ersir; biad. &ersir; bertait in coin. &ersir; is fo chen dóib. Buidig techta ‖ Connacht dond athesc. Luid iar sin co techtaib Ulad. Doratusa trá ar se asmo chuntabairt in coin do Chonchobur. &ersir; bid uallach tiastar ara chend .i. formna mathe Ulad. Bertait
ascada &ersir; ros bia failte. Budig techta Ulad.

I n-oenló i&mmacr; ro dalaitseom eter anair &ersir; aniar. Niro follaiged leosom dano táncatar da coiced Herend i n-oenló co mbátar i ndorus bruidni Meic Da Thó. Ticseom féin immach &ersir; dogní failte friu. Nirobar fachlisem a ócu. ar apaide is mo chen duib. Tait
issin les. Lotar iarum uili isin &mdot;bruidin. Leth in tigi dano la Connachta &ersir; in leth aile la Ulto. Nirbo bec dano in tech. secht &ndot;doruiss ind. &ersir; l. imdad eter cech da dorus. Niptar aigthe carat im &fdot;leid i&mmacr; bátar isin taig. Sochaide díb ro &fdot;uachtnaig fri araile. Tri chét bliadan ria &ndot;gein Christ ro boí in cocad eturru. Marbthair
dóib dano in mucc Meic Da Thó. Tri fichit gamnach coa biathadsaide co cend .uii. &mdot;bliadan. Tri neim i&mmacr; no bíata coro lathea ár fer &ndot;Herend impi.

Tucad dóib i.arum in mucc. &ersir; .xɫ. dam dia tarsnu cenmotha in biad archena. Mac Da Tho fessin icond &fdot;erdaigsecht. Mo chen
duib ar se ni dabar samail rissin ataat aige &ersir; mucca la Laigniu. A testa desin mairfider dúib imbarach. Is maith in mucc ar Conchobor. Is maith i&mmacr; ar Ailill. Cinnas rainnfither in mucc a Chonchobuir ar Ailill. Cinnas ar Bricriu mac Carbada anúasane. bale i taat láith gaile fer &ndot;Herend acht a rraind ar galaib &ersir; ar
chomramaib &ersir; dorat cách dib buille dar sróin a cheile riam. Dentar ar Ailill. Is cóir ar Conchobor. Atát gillai dún is taig ro imthigitar in cocrích.

Ricfaiter a les do gillai innocht a Chonchobuir ar Senlaech Arad a lLuachraib Conalad aniar. Ba menic ag méth díb d'&fdot;acbail
acumsa &ersir; rota Luachra Dedad fó tóin. Ba méthiu a n-ag foracbaisiu ocainni .i. do brathair fadéin .i. Cruachniu mac Rúadluim a Cruachnaib Conalad. Nirbo &fdot;errsaide ar Lugaid mac Con ruí andás in Loth Mor mac Fergusa meic Leti foracbad la Echbél mac

Dedad i Temair Lochra. Cinnas fir lib ol Celtchair mac Uthechair
Co&ndot;ganchness mac Dedad do marbad damsa &ersir; a chend do béim de. Immotarla trá dóib fo deóid. co tarat in t-oin&fdot;er for firu Herend .i. Cet mac Matach. Dofúargaibside i&mmacr; fair a gasced uas gaiscedaib in t⋅luaig. &ersir; ro gab scín inna laim &ersir; dessid ocon muicc. Fagabar tra ar se do &fdot;eraib Herend tairismi comrama frimsa ɫ lécud na
mmucci do raind dam. Roslá i socht na hUlto. Atchi a Loegaire or Conchobor. Niba fír ar Loegaire Cet do raind na mucce arar mbelaibni. An bic a Loegaire corot acilliur ar Cet. Is bés dúibsi infar nUltaib ar Cet. cech mac gaibes gaisced acaib ‖ is cucainni cend a baire. Dochuadaisiu dano isin cocrích. immatarraid dún
inti. foracbais in roth &ersir; in carpat &ersir; na heocho. Atrullais fein &ersir; gai triut. Nis toirchi in muicc fon innasin. Dessidside dano. Niba fír or laech find mór dodechaid assind imdai Cet do raind na mucci arar mbélaibni. Coich and so or Cet. Is ferr do laech andaisiu or cach. Oengus mac Lama Gabaid sin do Ultaib. Cid
dia ta Lam Gabuid for th' athairsiu or Cet. Cid ám. Rofetarsa or Cet. Dochuadusa sair fecht and. Eigther immum. doroich cách. Doroich dano Lám. Tarlaic urchor do gai mór damsa. Dosléicimse dano dosom in &ndot;gai cetna co mben a laini de co mbui for lár. Cid dobérad a mac do chomram frimsa. Téit Oengus
ina suide.

In comram do thairisem beus or Cet ɫ in mucc do raind damsa. Niba fír a rraind duitsiu chetumus ar laech find mór de Ultaib. Cia and so or Cet. Eogan mac Durthacht sin ar cách .i. rí Fernmaigi. Atchonnarcsa riam or Cet. Cia airm indom &fdot;acca ar Eogan. I
ndorus do thaige oc tabairt tana bó uait. Ro héged immumsa isin tír. Tanacaisiu fon égim. Ro thelgs gai &fdot;ormsa co rraba asmo scíath. Dollecimse duitsiu in &ndot;gai cetna. co lluid tret chend. &ersir; co mbert do ⋅úil asdo chind. Atotchiat fir Herend co n-óen⋅úil. Messe tall in t⋅úil aile asdo chind. Dessidside dano.

Frithalid dano a Ulto. in comram beus ar Cet. Nis raindfe innossa ar Munremor mac Gergind. Inn é seo Munremur ar Cet. Is me ro glan mo gó fo deoid a Munremur or Cet. Ní &fdot;uilet trí thráth and o thucusa tri laíchcind uait im chend do chétmeic ast &fdot;erund. Dessidside dano.

In comram beus or Cet. Rot bia són ar Mend mac Salcholcan. Cia so or Cet. Mend or cách. Cid ane or Cet. mac na mbachlach cusna lesanmannaib do chomram chucum. Ar ba úaimse &fdot;úair th' athair in t-ainmsin .i. Messe ra ben a ⋅ail de do chlaidiub conna

ruc acht oenchoss úaim. Cid dobérad mac ind oenchoisseda
chucum. Dessidside dano.

In comram beus or Cet. Rot bia or laech líath mór forgránna do Ultaib. Cia so or Cet. Celtchair mac Cuthechair sin or cách. An bic a Cheltchair or Cet manip dom thuarcain fo chetóir. Ro tanacsa a Cheltchair co dorus do thigi. Fo heged immum. Tánic
cách. Tanacaisiu dano. Dotluid i mbernai armo chindsa. doreilgis gae damsa. Ro thelgiusa gai n-aill chucutsu. co ndechaid triat liasait. &ersir; tria uachtur do macraille. Ataí co &ndot;galur &fdot;úail ond úairsin. noco rucad mac ɫ ingen duit ond uairsin. Cid dotbérad chucumsa. Dessidside dano

In comram beus or Cet. Rot bia son or Cuscraid Mend Macha mac Conchobuir. Cuich seo ar Cet. Cuscraid or cách. Is adbar ríg ‖ ar deilb. ni buide frit or in gilla. Maith or Cet. Cucainn cetna thanacais do chétgasciud a gillai. immatarraid dún issin chocrich. foracbais trian do muntire. &ersir; is amlaid dochuadais &ersir;
gai triat bragit. conna hetai focul fort chend i córai ar ro loitt in gai féthi do braget. Conid Cúscraid Mend atotchomnaic ond uairsin. Dorat tra fon n-innasin ail forsin cóiced uile.

In tan dī ro mbertaigestar ocon muicc &ersir; scían inna láim. co n-accatar Conall Cernach is tech. Is and tarblai&ndot;g for lár in taige.
Ferait Ulaid i&mdot; failte móir fri Conall. Is and rola Conchobor in cennide dia chind &ersir; rod mbertaigedar. Is maith lind ar cuit do thairiuc ar Conall. Cia rannas dúib. Ro ddét dond &fdot;ir nod ranna ar Conchobor .i. Cet mac Matach. In fir a Chit ar Conall tusso do raind na mmuicce. Is and asbert Cet.
conid and atbert Conall.

Bid mend inar n-imchomrucni ón ar Conall &ersir; bid mend inar n-imscarad. bid airscela la fer &mdot;brot. bid fiadnaisi la fer manath.
adcichset airg loman londgliaid fer dar fer is taig seo innocht. Eirg ón muicc dī or Conall. Cid dano dot béradsu chucci ar Cett. Is fir or Conall do chungid chomraime chucumsa. Dobér oenchomram duit a Cheit ar Conall. To&ndot;gu na to&ndot;gat mo thuath ora gabus gai im láim nach menic ro bá cen chend Connachtaig fóm
chind oc cotlud. &ersir; cen guin duine cech oenlá &ersir; cech oenaidchi. Is fir or Cet at ferr do láech andósa. Mad Anluan no beth is taig doberad comram ar araile duit. Is anim dún na fil is taig. Atá i&mmacr; ar Conall ic tabairt chind Ánlúain assa chriss &ersir; nos leice do Chet ara bruinni co rroimid a loim fola fora beolu. Ro gabside
i&mmacr; ón muic. &ersir; dessid Conall aicce.

Tecat don chomram a fechtsa ar Conall. Ni fríth ón la Connachta laech a thairismi. Doratad i&mmacr; damdabach dona boccótib immi imm chuairt ar ro boí drochcostud is taig do chloendiburgun la drochduini. Luid iarum Conall do raind na mmucci &ersir; gebid
dano cend in tarra ina beolo co rránic dó raind na mmucci. ra suig in tairr .i. aere ind nónbair conna fargaib ní de.

Ni tharat i&mmacr; do Chonnachtaib acht a da cois na mmucci fo brágit. Ba bec dano la Connachta a cuit. Atragatsaide. Atragat dano Ulaid co rriacht cách araile. Ro boí trá builli dar ó i suidiu.
comba comard ra ⋅liss in taige in carnail ro baí for lar in taigi. co mbatar na srotha don chrú forsna dorsi. Maidith dano na sluaig forna dorsi co rralsat grith mór co suifed fuil mol for lár ind liss .i. cach oc truastad ‖ a cheile. Is and gabais Fergus dóib dair mór ro boí for lár ind liss assa fremaib. Maidit immach
dano asind liss. Doberar in cath i ndorus ind liss.

Is and luid mac Da Thó immach &ersir; in cú inna láim coro leiced eturro. dús cia díb no thogad .i. rús con. Doraíga in cú Ulto. &ersir; ro leci for ár Connacht ar ro mebaid for Connachta. Asberatsom iss i mmaigib Ailbe ro gab in cú fertais in charpait fo Ailill &ersir; fo
Meidb. Is and donáraill Fer Loga ara Ailella &ersir; Medba .i. co rrala a cholaind for leth. &ersir; coro an a chend i fertais in charpait. Atberat dano is de atá Mag Ailbe .i. Ailbe ainm in chon.

Dolluid a mmaidm andes for Beluch Mugna sech Roírind. for Áth Midbine i mMastin sech Druim Criaig fris rater Cell Dara
indiu. sech Ráith Imgain. i Fid &ndot;Gaible. do Áth Mac Lugnai. sech Druim Da Maige. for Drochet Cairpri. oc Áth Chind Chon i mBiliu. is and ro lá cend in chon asin charput. Ic techt iar fraechrud Mide síar. is and donarlaic Fer Loga isin fraech .i. ara Ailella. &ersir; ro li&ndot;g isin carput iar cúl Conchobuir corra gaib a chend dar aiss.13240 Beir buide n-anacuil a Chonchobuir ar se. T'ógríar ar Conchobor. Niba mór ar Fer Loga .i. mo breith latt do Emain Macha. &ersir; mná oentama Ulad &ersir; a n-ingena macdacht do gabail cepoce cecha nón a immum. co n-erbrat Fer Loga mo lennansa. Ba écen ón ar ní laimtis chena la Conchobor. &ersir; ra leiced Fer Loga dar Áth Luain
síar dia bliadna &ersir; dá gabair Chonchobuir leis co n-allaib óir friu. Conid desin ro cet.

lg.l: bec in cin tria cha&ndot;gin chon
Tri meic Nerai ar lín lerg.
nis relic uad ri se thráth.

div1.head: Incipit Talland Etair
div1.p:
BAÍ fer amnas étrocar i nHerind .i. Aithirne Ailgesach de Ultaib. Fer ro chunnig a oen⋅úil ón chaech. &ersir; no guided in mnai oc lamnad. Is de boi dosom dia lluid for cúaird a
comairli Chonchobuir. Is ed luide i tosuch chetumus tuathbel Herend co rrala cuairt Connacht. Is ed luide iarum co rríg medóin Herend eterna da Ath Chliath .i. co Echaid mac Luctai co rríg descirt Connacht. Luidside dia idnacul ind Athirni co firu Muman dar Sinaind fades. Conna ruca ar ndimda a Athirni or Eochaid.
ma tá ocaiind do ⋅étaib ɫ maínib ní bas áil duit co rruca. Atá i&mmacr; or Athiune ind oen⋅úil út fil it chind do brith damamsa im durn. Níba éra i&mmacr; or Eochaid rot bia. Is and dorat in rí a mér fo ⋅úil co tall assa chind &ersir; co tarat i ndorn Aitherne. Geib mo láim a gillai or in rí dochum ind usci do nigi mo agthi. Dális iarum tri
tonna dond usciu imma agid. In tallad in t⋅úil asmo chind a gillai or in rí. All amae or in gilla. is derg in derc dot &fdot;uil. Bid ed a ainm co bráth or in rí .i. Dergderc. Lasin féli dano daroni in rí .i. a oen⋅úil do thabairt do chind a enig. Firt feli dano dorat Dia dá ⋅úil dósom. Is desin ro cet.

Iss ed dolluid Athirne iar suide co rrig Muman .i. co Tigerna Tetbuillech. Nira gaib dano ní dia inchaibside acht ind rígan
do &fdot;eis leis ind aidchisin. nó einech fer Muman do brith co bráth. Ocus ind aidchisin ro assaíted in ben is í ad aig ra &fdot;oí la Athirne do aenig a fir arna ructha a enech.

Iss ed luide Athirne iar sin co lLaigniu co mboí i nArd Brestine i ndesciurt Maige Fea. &ersir; tancatar descert Lagen ina agid do
tharcsin sét &ersir; maíne dó arna digsed issin tír. dáig na facbad ailche. Ar ní bítis a maíne nach neich fora tabrad ammus mani thabairthe dó. Ni &fdot;aicfed dano athgabáil túath ɫ chenel lasa mairfide som. Co tabrad in fer a mnai dó. no co tabrad a oín⋅úil asa chind. no co tabrad a ⋅aint do ⋅étaib &ersir; maínib. Is ed i&mmacr; tucsom inna menmain
ailchi móra d'acbáil for Laignib coro marbtais Lagin é co mbetis Ulaid do grés oca dígail for Laigniu. Is and trá gabais áilgis do desciurt Lagen i mBrestine .i. nad &fdot;acca do sétaib ɫ maínib ní no gabad uadib. acht ail brethri do &fdot;acbáil forro co bráth conna turgebtais a n-aigthe ‖ la Goedelu. mani thucdais dósom in sét
as dech boí is tulaig &ersir; nad fitir nech is tilaig cia sét so ɫ cia bale i rrabe.

Ba gress &ersir; ba imdergad mór don t⋅lúag anísin. &ersir; ro guidetar uile Tigerna na ndúl co tardad fortacht dóib im di&ndot;gbáil díb na gressi rolad forro. Baí tra marcach ic airimrim a eich is tilaig.
doscuiched dochum na hairechta. no li&ndot;ged uadib. Fecht and dī oc soud ind eich dar colptha. Docuridar in t-ech fót mór da díb croib. Niro airig duine isind airiucht coni tarla i n-ucht ind ríg .i. Fergusa Fairge. Co n-accaiside a ndelg i n-agid ind &fdot;óit dond leith on talmain. i rrabatar cethri fichit u&ndot;ga do dergór. Cid fil
im uchtsa or in rí a Athirni. Is and asbert Athirni.

Is é in delgsin rop áil damsa or Athirne .i. brathair m'atharsa fodracaib &ersir; dorat i talmain iar maidm áir chatha for Ulto .i. cath Brestini. Is and sin doratad dó in delg. Ocus luid iar sin co Mes Gegra .i. rí Lagen. Brathair dó Mes Roídia .i. dá mac Datho in sin. buidir amlabair a mmathair &ersir; a n-athair. Feraid Mess
Gegra falti móir fri Athirne. Is maith limsa trá or Athirne acht co rraib im &fdot;arrad co mmatin. Cid ara tibrind mo mnaí duit ar in rí. Dot inchaib ol Athirne. Naconom marbasa corop ail do Laignib co bráth. &ersir; conna hanat Ulaid com digailse forro co bráth. Mad ar Ultaib nocot biadso falti limsa a Athirni. Rot
bia in ben i&mmacr; dom inchaibse. Ni &fdot;ail i&mmacr; la Ulto oen&fdot;er nos berad

acht manis tabraind duitsiu dom inchaib. Is fír ol Athirne. Ni anubsa trá ditso co rruca oen&fdot;er d'Ultaib do chend &ersir; do mnai. Ni gébthar inniut or in rí. Rot bia falti. Foid in ben leis .i. Buan ben Mess Gegra. Ocus anaid Athirne for cúaird Lagen co
cend &mdot;bliadna co tuc tri coicdu rigan do mnaib flatha &ersir; dagdoine Lagen dia mbreith dia thír leis.
Maith tra a gillai ol Athirne fria gilla airg damsa co Ulto co tisat imm agid. Is dochu biaid imrádud la Laigniu formsa immon &mdot;braitse acht co nnechur dia n-inchaib.

Dollotar dī Lagin do chelebrad do Athirniu co mbatar oc Telchuine fri Ath Cliath atúaid. Celebraid dóib iarum inti Athirne &ersir; ni &fdot;argaib bennachtain. &ersir; ni thuc a n-aill. Ba olc i&mmacr; la Lagnib a mnaa do brith uadib i mbrait do Ultaib. O thanic do ainiuch Lagen inti Athirne lotar Lagin do iarmoracht a mbraiti.
Doroachtatar Ulaid dano i n-iarmóracht Athirni. Dollotarside dia thessaircainseom. Fechair cath immi fo chétoir. Maidid for Ulto. co ndechatar la muir sair co rragbad Etar forru. Noí trath dóib i nEtur cen dig cen biad. acht meni esbetar ⋅ál in mara. ɫ mani dotar in n-uir. Secht cét bó i&mmacr; la Athirne for lár in dúni ‖
&ersir; ni rabi la Ulto mac na fer no blaissed a loimm acht no leicthe fon aill a mblegon. arna taiscelad nech dib etir a biadsom do blassacht. &ersir; dobertis cuci ind &fdot;ir athgoeti &ersir; ní leiced banne ina. cend co n-aplaitis a n-oínur do chrógalar. &ersir; teigtis niathe Ulad cuce i n-impide im dig do Chonchobur &ersir; nocon éta úad. Conid
ed no &fdot;urad Chonchobor a ndobered ind ingen fora mmuin otá Emuin Macha im thráth nóna béus .i. Leborcham is sí dobered. Mug &ersir; cumal ro batar i tig Conchobuir is í gein rucad eturru .i. ind ingen Leborcham. Ba dochraid dano a delb na ingine .i. a da traigid &ersir; a da glún inna diaid. a da escait &ersir; a dá sáil rempe.
Is í toichled Herind i n-oenló. Cech m do maith &ersir; do ⋅aich dognithea i nHerind adfeided do Chonchobur isin Chroibrúaid deod lai. Turtíne tri fichet &mdot;bargen ara cind i cind tened. cenmotha a cuit lasin slúag. Is í tra no bered a chuit do Chonchobur ara mmuin otá Emuin co Étar.

No bíd tra ind imguin eter lá &ersir; aidchi immon dún. Atberat Lagin is síat ro chlaidsetar Dún Etair. Atá Bern Chon Culaind and cen iadad. No bíd cách ica gressacht imma immi. Nithó ar se cúal gai immusniada lemsa. No bíd dano Conchobor oc airbriathrad Con Culaind conna rucad a burach immach etir .i.
co tairsed tóchostul Ulad. ar dochoid Leborcham do thochostul Ulad. co tístais i curchaib ɫ co tistais ar tír dia cobair.

Doratad i&mmacr; Mess Dead mac Amargin dalta do Choin Culaind mac secht &mdot;bliadan ar cléith ar dorus in dúne. &ersir; nonbur cecha uaire isind ló do marbad dó. &ersir; geill Ulad do thabairt immach
cech lá do Lagnib fó thrí. &ersir; a mbreith innund do Mes Dead fo thrí ar galaib. Combad airsein no imberthea écomlund i tosaig i nHerind. Iss ed trá asberatsom in tan rod &ndot;gabsat Ulaid i tir issind Etur anair. Is and dochotar tri chét laech cosin mac forsin chléith dia marbad. Dorat a búriud ass iarum oc beim a chind
de. Co cuala Cu Chulaind. Is nem maidesɫ is muir thráges ɫ talam conscara ɫ búriud mo daltaise oc imbirt ecomluind fair. La sodain focheird Cu Chulaind bedg immach. Roínti in sluag ina diaid. Fechair cath and fo chetóir. Trom i&mmacr; in gress ro lasat. Cróda ind imthócbail amnas a mbúrach ro &fdot;ersat na curaid &ersir; na láith
gaile. Ro co&ndot;gaibthe trá na da urgail ó theirt co nónai. Maidid iarum for Lagnib co turgabsat múr derg fri Ulto. ar ba geis do Ultaib dul dar múr &ndot;derg. Ba fe ille &fdot; ba fe innund i&mmacr; in comrac. Dorochratar sochaide mór and do Ultaib i frecur in chatha. Dorochair and chetumus Mess Dead mac Amargin. &ersir; Bríannán
Brethach. &ersir; Condla. &ersir; Beothach &ersir; Conaed mac Mornai &ersir; sochaide archena.

Is and sin tra luid Leborcham fothuaid riasin sluag co celmuiniu do mnaib Ulad ar ro batarside i &ndot;gúais &ersir; gábud &ersir; i toirsi móir ond uair ro gabad Etur forsna feraib .i. Mugain Aittenchaithrech ben
Chonchobuir meic Nesa andtuaid. Feidelm Noichruthach ‖ dano ingen Chonchobuir .i. noí crotha furri &ersir; ba hailliu cach cruth araile. Feidelm &Fdot;oltchaín and dano ben Loegaire Buada ig. Findbec ingen Echach ben Chethirn meic &Fdot;intain. Brig Brethach ben Cheltchair. Findnige ingen Echach ben Eogain meic Durthacht.
Findch aem ingen Chathbada ben Amairgin Iar&ndot;giunnaig. Derb &Fdot;orgaill ben Lugdach Riab &ndot;Derg. Emer &Fdot;oltchain ingen Forgaill Manaig. ben Con Culaind meic &Sdot;ualtaim. Lendabair ingen Eogain meic Durthacht ben Chonaill meic Amairgin. Niab ingen Cheltchair meic Uthidir ben Chormaic Con Longes meic
Conchobuir. Mó t urim andro batar do degmnaib and chena. Mugain tra ro boí oca hacallaimsi na Leborchaimmi. Conid and atbertsi Mugain.

A ingen a luath a Lebarcham cia Ulto ána acca. A bé find &fdot;orusta atchonnarcsa caimchele sliasta i sni m sruth&fdot;ola. Fua
mbui beo cathmil Conchobor. Atchonnarc and Coin Culaind

certlain o chúl co ulaig cnedmar fadessin essi derga dia luid. Atconnarc Loegaire lon- Buadach fria thair culpait tolla imma thoíbu. tlacht a da bergin buada bebárnatar. Atconnarc and Brianan bretsatar fir frisa
comarnaic carn. Atconnarc and Gabliol lesciol lemnech lug. Atconnarc and Conla Cáem toib selgatar fri lathraige lár. Atconnarc and Furbaide Fer Bend for daid ben doensus dergsus asa beirn buí. Atconnarc and Eogan Eo dia dergdeiss. assa dí láim dobebarnatar fuili folcmara fair. Atconnarc and Dubthach
di dóit lugdaig leosait dessa dlu&ndot;gsius. Atconnarc and Lugaid lín a mac &mdot;brogsus in n-ind fri durach &ndot;derg. Atconnarc and Amairgin artruad ro lassair assa chuthchath cath. Atconnarc and Ferġna fer brígach fer cetaro raid ria cach coraid foa dib sebtaib selsus. Atconnarc and Auchride augestar fri ⋅lúag ⋅ainsóis fria
n-indeg firu foi fó. Atconnarc and Beothaig beogestar dara óir srethius. fuli foa ún a ⋅elad fri slas. Atconnarc in tudbigid troethas rigrátha Rochad rúadbullech mac find Fatheman fri sellad slúag. Atconnarc and in suid sulbair soacallma rosiacht a ardinsci ardrígda úad ro ⋅áraigsetar fir Fercherdne file ind ríg. Atconnarc and
Fiachraig n-ail ail cech ecló saír clóó. Atconnarc and Conaed cetguinech cetaro ráid ecrata garg. a róe rith ro bith mac Mornai moid no da thoib tuill túaim i timargar ith. Atconnarc and Corpre cend fir fris tnuid fris brunniu ben. Atconnarc and na riglasra lassait amal oínaíbill. garg a &ndot;gascid gním gaile glaine. &ersir; Gormainech13465 Mane Milscothach &ersir; Ailil scel &ersir; Toscel Dures &ersir; Ret &ersir; Bricriu bertsait mórgnimu noí meic Carbada uill. Atconnarc and Conall Cernach co coscraib co fodbaib co finnib co n-étib co n-ócaib ro ráith bríga in cathmiled cathbúadach cathchoscrach Conall cáem Cernach. Atconnarc and Úarathach Cethern claidebrúad conmeil morgala.
asa Eolairg ard. Atconnarc and fo&fdot;uaratar Ulaid nírro selgatar amal liges milchobur mil millsiund sastund sál mara móir tethragtar cu tig. Atconnarc and do &fdot;uargaib ‖ ur immon sínsetar fir.

immo tarlaicthe cranna imma cloiset gai. sciathgal scíath i cath. i cathbuadaig Ulaid iar n-araib ecrat iar fortbiu buiden iar slige air.
Dofairchelsa giall cech coicid de choicedaib Herend acht coiced Galion dofil ticfat tadbat fibait i nEmam dadaig. Ulaid ollchathaig frithalid na firu dosfil far &ndot;dochum acht cecha torchair díb iss ed celmaini in sein ruc Leborcham do mnaib Ulad.

Luid Conall Cernach a oenur i n-iarmoracht Lagen do dígail a
brathar dorochratar sin chath .i. Mes Dead. &ersir; Loegaire. Iss ed luide for Áth Clíath sech Drummainech for Uib Gabla. i Forcarthain. sech Uachtur Aird. sech Nás. do Chloínud.

O ráncatar dī Lagin a tír luid cách úadib dia bailiu. Anais i&mmacr; Mess Gegra for Cassán Chloínta a oínur. &ersir; a ara dar éssi in t⋅lúaig.
Contuiliubsa colléic ar in t-ara fri Mess Gegra. &ersir; contolasu iarum. Maith lim ar in rí. A mbuí Mess Gegra oc descin ind usci co n-acca in cnoi ar fut na haband chuce. Ba meti cend fir in chnú. Luid sís fadessin conos tuc cuce &ersir; ros teind cona scín. &ersir; foracaib leth ind eitne don gillu. Co n-&fdot;accaiseom in &ndot;gilla do&fdot;urcbad ón
talmain triana chotlud. &ersir; ro dúsig in gilla iar sin assa chotlud. Cid taí a gillai ol in rí. Drochaslingi atchonnarc ar in gilla. Gaib na eochu a gillai ol in rí. Ro gab in gilla na eochu. In chnú dódais ar in gilla. iss ed or in rí. In farcbais a lleth damsa or in gilla. Minigid lim chetus or in rí. In fer doid in &mdot;bec sechomsa
ar in gilla no issad a mmór. Ro boí a lám in ríg fria agid ind ríg co lleith ind eitni. Donaidlend in gilla co claidiub co tall a láim de. Olc sin a gillai ol in rí. Oslaic mo dorn atá leth ind eitni and. Amal atchonnairc in gilla anísin imsoí in claideb friss fessin co ndechaid triana druim síar. Fe amae a gillai or in rí.
Indlid fessin inti Mess Fegra a charput &ersir; dobeir a laim ind ara belaib. In tan dī luid assinn áth síar. Is and doriacht Conall issin áth anair. Amlaid sin a Mess Gegra ar Conall. Ató sund ar Mess Gegra. Ceist iarum ar Conall. Cid ail and ar Mess Gegra acht intí dia ndligi &fdot;iachu saig fair cach cumung rot bé. Atát
mo brathir latsu ar Conall. Ni 'm chriss atát ar Mess Gegra. Bid anim ón ar Conall. Ni fír &ndot;gascid ar Mes Gegra. comrac frimsa co n-oenláim. Is fair bias ar Conall. cumrigfithir mo lám dom thaíbse ar Conall. Co bo thrí ro cumriged lám Chonaill Chernaig dia thoíb. Ro thuairc cach a chéile combó derg ind aband díb. Fortressiu
iarum a chluchi in Chonaill. Maith trá a Chonaill ar Mes Gegra.

Rofetarsa ni ragasu co rruca mo chendsa lett. &ersir; tabair mo chend fort chend &ersir; m'orddan for th'orddan. Benaid Conall a chend de ic Cassán Chloínta. &ersir; berid Conall in cend co tarat forin liic ar bruach átha. ‖ dolluid banna a mmediu in chind co ndechaid I
cend in chorthi co lluid trit co talmain. Dobert dano a chend forsa corthe. &ersir; adnaic a cend in corthe co talmain co tarla fora beolu docum na haband. Conall Cloen a ainmseom co sain. ar ro batar tri ainmi la Ulto .i. Conall Clóen, &ersir; Cu Chulaind Goll. &ersir; Cuscraid Mend. Ro randsat mna Ulad i trí iat. Ro char cach a
&fdot;er don triursin. A trian ro charsa Coin Culaind batís guill cot acallaim. A trian ro charsat Conall Cloen batis cloín cot acallaim. A trian ro charsat Cuscraid batis guit cot acallaim. Dobert i&mmacr; Conall a chendsom fora chend conid tarla dara ais combo diriuch ond uairsin.

Luid dī Conall ina charpat a oínur &ersir; in t-ara i carpat Mes Gegra. Nos brogat dó iarum i nUachtur Fine. Co comrancatar fri coicait &mdot;ban and sin .i. Buan ben Mes Gegra cona bantrocht oc tuidecht assin chocrich atúaid. Cia cá taí a ben ar Conall. ben Mess Gegra ríg. Timarnad duit techt limsa ar Conall. Cia do thimarnae
or in ben. Mess Gegra ar Conall. In tucais chomartha latt or in ben. A charpat &ersir; a eich sund ar Conall. Sochaide da tabair seotu ar in ben. A chend suno dano ar Conall. Am dílessa uadsom a fechtsa or in ben. No imdergtha in cend indara fecht &ersir; ro bánta in fecht aile. Cid dás in cend a ben ar Conall.
Rofetarsa i&mmacr; ar in ben. Immarbág dorala eturro &ersir; Athirne. Atrubairtseom nacham béradsa oen&fdot;er d'Ultaib. Comrac imma brethir iarum iss ed daas in cend. Tairsiu chucumsa ar Conall issin carpat. an frim or si coro chainiur mo cheile. Tuargaib

iarum a foíd guil esti. co clos co Temraig. &ersir; co Alind. &ersir; fosceird
dara cend &ersir; sí marb. Ata a fert forsin t⋅ligi .i. Coll Buana. in coll ro ás triana &fdot;ert.

Dotuc ass a gillai ar Conall. Foréimdim in cend do breith lim or in gilla. Gat a inchind ass or Conall. &ersir; immir claideb fair. &ersir; tuc a inchind latt. &ersir; cummaisc áel air. co nderna liathroit de.
Dogníther ón &ersir; facabair in cend acon mnaí. &ersir; lotarsom co rancatar Emain. Ba maídmech i&mmacr; la Ulto rí Lagen do marbad doib.
Is de sin trá atá Cuaird Athirni. &ersir; Marbad Mes Gegra do Chonall Chernach &ersir; Cath Etair.

div1.head: Athirne Áilgessach &ersir; Mider Brí Léith
div1.p:
ATHIRNE Ailgessach mac Ferchertne. is e is doichlechu ro
boi i nHerind. Dochoid co Mider Brí Léith co tuc corra diultada &ersir; doichle úad fora thech .i. ar dibe &ersir; ar dochill. Arna taidled fer do &fdot;eraib Herend a thechsom do aigidecht ɫ &fdot;oigde. Na tair. na tair ar in chetchorr. Eirgg ass ol a setig. Sech thech sech thech ar in tres chorr. Cach fer do &fdot;eraib Herend ataciched
ni gebed fria chomlund a llaasin. Nocho doid a. ⋅aith riam bale i n&fdot;acced duine. Luidseom dano &ersir; mucc urgnaide leis &ersir; paitt meda co n-essad a ⋅aith a oinur. &ersir; ro chertaigestar ara belaib ‖ in muicc &ersir; in paitt meda. Co n-acca in fer chuice. Dogenta th'oínur ar se la tadall na mmuicce &ersir; na paitte uad. Cia th'ainmseo ar Athirni. Nocon erdairc ón ar se .i. Sethor. Ethor. Othor. Sele. Dele. Dreng Gerce. Mec Gerce. Ger Gér. Dír Dír iss ed mo ainmse. Ni thanic in mucc. &ersir; for&fdot;emmid inn air do chuibdigud. Dóig combad ó Dia thísta do breith na mmucce. ar nírbo anfélisium ond uairsin.

head.sup: Athirne and Amairgen son of Ecet Salach

div1.p:
BAÍ goba amra i nUltaib .i. Eccet Salach goba a ainm. Ainm
n-aill do Echen. suí cech admait. conna rabi riam ɫ iarum goba bad &fdot;err. Rucad iarum mac dó. Amairgen a ainm. Ro buí iarum in macsin i mmacrai cethéora &mdot;bliadna déc. cen labrad. Ro ás a. brú iarum combo méit adbul teig móir. &ersir; ba feithech glasremor in brúsin. &ersir; a smucli asa ⋅róin inna beolu. Ba dub a
chroccend. Batir gela a &fdot;iacla. Ba glasbán a aged. Amal da urbuinne builg goband a lurgne &ersir; a ⋅liastai. Batir laebladracha a thraigid. Batir adbolmóra a adbronna. Batir ardda imchiana a da &ndot;gruad. Batir domna dubderga a dí ⋅úil. Ba lebormailgech anúas. Ba garb drestaide a &fdot;olt. ba mellach cnámach carrgarb
a druim. Nibó cáemduine samlaid. Dia follaigthe cu ciana inna ⋅uidiu cen &fdot;oglanad doacmaised a múrtraide dó cotice a di leiss. Batír é a ⋅ercla gruth bruithe. mór luatha. mera derga. caera glassa. diasa loscthi. gais chrema. cnoi caecha a mbith for clár oca oca airfitiud.

Do&fdot;oíd iarum Athirne a gilla .i. Greth a ainm co Ecet Salach do chor béla i tenid. Co n-acca Greth in n-arracht &ndot;dóer &ndot;dochraid ísin ara chind for lar in tige. Danéci co anmín. atrágestar Greth. Buí ingen Ecit i cathair cumtachtai &ersir; tlacht derscaigthe impe issin tig. &ersir; sí a hoínur oc comét in tige. &ersir; in mac na fail. Co cualatae
ní in mac fri gilla nAthirni. In n-ith Greth gruth ol se fo thrí. Niro recart Greth. &ersir; atrágestar co mmór. Asbert i&mmacr; frisseom arisi. Grínmuine gránmuine gais chrema. cuae uinn. ubla greti. gruth. in n-ith Greth gruth.

Atnaig Greth dó assin tig. conid corastar dar droichtiu ind
liss. isin cechair. Luidi iar sin co rranic Athirne. Atchonnarcais ócu ol Athirne olc féth fil fort. Deithbir dam ol Greth . Mac cetheora &mdot;bliadan naro labrastar riam dom acallaim indiu. &ersir; fot&fdot;uicfeso in macsin cen grád mani dibdaither. Cid asrubairt frit ol Athirne. Ni handsa ol Greth. In n-ith Greth. &ersir;c. Imchomairc
Athirne cindas both isind liss. Adfét dó in gilla uile amal luide Greth assind liss.

Tanic Ecet fo chetoir. Asbert a ingen fris. Ro labrastar Amargen indiu ol si fri gilla nAthirni dodechaid sund do denam bela lais. Cid asbert friss. In n-ith Greth gruth. &ersir;c. Bid ed
bias de ol Ecet. Ticfa Athirne do marbad in meic arna ragba fair. ar biaid mór sóis ocun mac ro rádi in sein.

Dotet ind ingen iarum cosin mac lé assind liss dond airgi buí oc Sliab Mis tess. Dogní Ecet deilb in meicc di chriaid &ersir; suidigis fo láim chlí dó etir &ersir; a builg. &ersir; dobert dagthimthach imbi. &ersir; suidigis
inna liugu amal bid ina chotlud no beth.

Tic Athirne iar sin &ersir; a gilla Greth. Co n-accatar in mac inna thálgud. Dognith a mbieil leo. &ersir; batar ro maith &ersir; adacht for samthaig. Dambert Athirne imma chend na ‖ delba ucut amal bed in mac beth and. &ersir; atnaig do for teiched &ersir; eigther
impu.

Lotar in t⋅luaig ina ndiaid. Tecmalla Aithirne a &fdot;olad &ersir; a inmass issin less. &ersir; gabtha fair a les. Tecait Ulaid gleithir eturru. Doberar .uii. cumala &ersir; log a einig dó &ersir; dognither cora eturru. &ersir; gaibid Athirne in mac for altram .i. Amorgen &ersir; legais suithe filidechta
laiss. Conid iarum ro laig senordacht for Athirne &ersir; ro gab Amorgen ardollomnacht Ulad.

Dodechaid tra Athirne fecht and for turus isin &fdot;ogomur do thaig a daltai Amorgene co mbaí adaig and. &ersir; coro &fdot;obbair imthecht
arnabarach. Conid and atbert Amorgen ac fostud Athirni.
Ro thriall dano imthecht isin gemrud. conid and atbert Amorgen.
Ro triall dano imthecht isind erruch. Conid and atbert Amorgen.

lg.l: a fid a féor glas. G.

div1.p: Ro triall dano imthecht issin t⋅amrud conid and atbert Amorgen ica chetugud dó.

Ro cetaiged dó iarum imthecht issin t⋅amrud. O rasiacht
iarum oc Athirne imthecht. is and ra thothlaihsetar a daltai .i.

Amargin coro thothlaigedsaide co Athirne ní dia éicsi do thadbsin dóib. Is ed tothlugud dorone Amairgin .i. tarb do thabairt is tech dia marbad do Athirne. conid and atbert Athirne oc tairmesc marbtha in tairb.

lg.l: tairrechtaid cecha tana in tarb. T.

div1.p: Doberar gamain is tech dia marbad dar eis in tairb. conid and atbert Athirme.
Diarberar iar sin caire is tech dia marbad. Conid and atbert Athirne.

lg.l: esbadach aith iarna dith imma tlacht.
buaid di a llacht a llóe.

div1.p: Doberar muc is tech iar tain co n-erbailt Athirne iar tain ic erail a mmarbtha.

lg.l: riana laile bal don matai is mo chen. M.

div1.p:
Ataigther tene trom trichemruad dó iar sin. Conid and atbert
Athirne. ‖

div1.head: Aided Cheltchair meic Uthechair
div1.p:
CId dia ta Aided Cheltchair meic Uthechair. Ni handsa. Fer
amra ro buí de Ultaib .i. Blai Briuga. Secht n-airgeda leis. Secht fichit bo cecha argi. &ersir; seisrech cecha hargi. Tech n-oíged. ferand leis. Ba geiss do dano ben for damrud dochum a thaigi cen &fdot;eiss dosom lee meni beth a fer na farrad. Dolluid dī Bríg Brethach ben Cheltchair for oigidecht dochum a thaigi.
Ni maith a ndoronais a ben ar Blai Briuga. Is geiss damsa do thuidecht chucum amal tancais. Is fer truag ar in ben loittes a. gessi féin. Is fir dano ar se. Foid lee in n-aidchisin. Adfiadar do Cheltchar. Dolluidside d'iarraid a mna. Luid Blai Briuga co mbai eter Chonchobor &ersir; Choin Culaind. Bátar oc imbirt &fdot;idchilli
desciurd o Emuin Macha. Luid dano Celtchar mac Uthechair co mbui i com&fdot;ocus do. ro baí bruinne ind &fdot;ir darsin fidchill. no clannaCeltchar in lúin ind co mbui triana druim iar &ndot;dul in gai triit. co ndechaid banna da &fdot;uil co mbuí forsin &fdot;ithchill. Amein a Chu Chulaind ar Conchobor. Amein dano a Chonchobuir
for Cu Chulaind. Ra tomsed on banda ille &ersir; inund. dus cia dib diarbo &fdot;oicsiu. Faicsiu in banna dano do Chonchobur. Siade cosin digail deirb. Atbath tra Blai Briuga. Atrulla Celtchar co mbui isna Deisib Muman tess.

Is olc so a Chonchobuir ar Ulaid. Is tuitim deisi and so. Ropo
lor in fer marb diar n-esbuid. Ticed Celtchar dia thír. Ticed dano ar Conchobor. &ersir; eirged a mac fora chend. &ersir; teiged i conimairge fris. Ni geibthe dano cin ind athar forin mac. ɫ cin in meic forsind athair. Luidside dī di gairm Cheltchair co mboí thess.

Cid dia tudchad ar Celtchar. Meise ar in gilla. ro cumrigset, tar do geissu &ersir; i commairge frit. Fir or se. Is seim in muin doberat Ulaid ummumsa techt for muin mo meic. Bid Seim a ainm &ersir; ainm a cheneoil ar in drui. Ansu a gilla or se. &ersir; ragatsa. Dogníther ón. Is de ata Semuine na nDési.

Is í tra eraicc conattecht im Blai Briugaid na tri fochaide ata andsom ticfad la Ultu na remes do di&ndot;gbail díb. Dolluid dī Co&ndot;ganchnes mac Dedad do digail a brathar for Ultu .i. Cu Ruí mac Daire meic Dedad. Ro fasaigestar Ulto co mmor. Ni &ndot;geibtis gai. ɫ chlaidib. acht no scendis ass amal de cho&ndot;gnu.
Di&ndot;gaib din in fochaidseo a Cheltchair ar Conchobor. Maith ám ar Celtchar

Luid dia acallaim in Cho&ndot;ganchnis laa and co tarat breic imme. Cor gell a ingin do .i. Niab ingen in Cheltchair &ersir; praind ceit dia tairiuc cecha nona. Co tarat in ben breic imme co n-erbairt
frie in n-innas no mairbfithe .i. bera iairn it eat derga tria mo luirgnib &ersir; im bonnab ‖

nad fordamarsa gol ban &ersir; mac cen etráin forru cosindiu. La sin doci&ndot;g in .l. banrigan ara chind &ersir; tornochtait a cíche friss. Is accu ro taiscelad ar tús cichi ban do nochtad .i. forna macgnimradaib.
&ersir; oc fastud Chon Culaind i nEmain Macha. &ersir; dobretha na téora dabcha usci do díbdúd a brotha. &ersir; ní tarlaiced a llaasin dochum in chatha.

R. Atraí a Chu Chulaind comerig cob airthe Mag Murthemne ar firu Galeoin a gein Loga soalta soí frit
churad cathchlessu. A Chu Chulaind comerig co mburetar basa lia indrid Murthemni. Móra airdi óic do níth. nachit Cormac cotalgad Admuintire i céin Chonchobuir. ní tá Conall comnesam Cormaic ar nin eroemaid ar ni tria gairi cotobgní Lugaid lanchlemnas goin frisgegna gním. Gaib
immut a andremuig a huí Chathbad comérig. Atrai. Conid and atbert Cu Chulaind .

.R. An dím a ingen. ni mm'óenur domiulsa Chonchobuir coiced ciabo bidbu imnedach ní imgen m'oenur ar is diairle iarna scís mo scís. nidam eirr imtholtanach accobrach
imgona indiu.
Is and atbert Niab ingen Cheltchair ben Conaill Chernaig.

.R. Deithbir duitsiu ón a Chu Chulaind nit charpat Conaill comathar caín róg renar ar Ultaib i n-athaib buaderthaib bith conid uanchend airm inid accid. ar ní imgonaid na
aill ni gním ní chenae acht a &fdot;ithis móir meic Amairgin.
A ben em ar Cu Chulaind ciabam trúsa nim tharraid cubes conróetar m'ainech nim ág archelad ni mmo guin immgabaim.

Iar sin ro li&ndot;g Cu Chulaind fora gaisced. &ersir; ro gab fathi immi. In cetna fathi ro -.ab immi ro maid fair co torchair a delg asa láim.
Conid and atbert Cu Chulaind.

.R. Ni bidba bratt beres robud. is bidba delg athchummas chness. co tuitt tria thraigid. sciath for scanfaiter fuidb. scarad faebuir. fri desláim mo duirn mosbaim fuil anabaid crechtnaigfit formnai fer. airchisfither dia már des Maig
Murthemni dimes.

Iar sin ro gab a &fdot;athi immi. &ersir; ro gab a sciath co faebur chonduala &fdot;air. Conid and atbert fri Loeg mac Riangabra. Innill dún a phobba Laíg in carpat. To&ndot;gu do dia a to&ndot;ges mo thúath or Láech ciano beth coiced Conchobuir immon Liath Macha nis
tibritis dochum in charpait. Ní erbart frit cosindiu. In menma nom airfitiged do grés ní hé domriacht. Maso áil duit tair féin da acallaim ind Leith fadessin. Teite Cu Chulaind a dochum. &ersir; ro impa in t-ech a chlé friss fo thrí. &ersir; ro scaíl in Morrígu in carpat issind aidchi remi. ar nirbo ail lé a dul Con Culaind dochum in
chatha. ar rofitir noco ricfad Emuin Macha afrithisi. Conid de asbert Cu Chulaind frisin Liath Macha.

.R. Níbu gnáth a Leith lithe for clé frim fechuir fíach fonat gaibim gním donothlogmar éc. m thintla mo menma i mmuige mag dianot imredinn ciana éssi derga ‖ imchíana
eich sceó ruith scarad creta cu&ndot;gai fortche forsa suidmís suide suilig ro don bai Badb i nEmuin Macha. Nibu gnath.

La sodain dodechaid in Liath Macha co tarlaic .a bolgdéra móra fola fora dib traigthib. La ssin ro ling Cu Chulaind in carpat. &ersir; docuridar bedg de fodes iar Sligi Midluachra. Co n-accai in
n-ingin ara chind .i. Lebarcham ingen Auae &ersir; Adarci. .i. mug &ersir;
cumal ro boí i tig Conchobuir .i. Auae &ersir; Adarc. conid and asbert Lebarcham.

.R. Nán fácaib nán fácaib a Chu Chulaind. Fíal do gnúis. gartach do grúad. goirthech caíngnúis do gnúis cnedach
caín in tocad. ardo díth dubae dia mairgfem. mairrg ar mná. mairg ar maccu. mairg ar súle sir do guba muiche cichseo dano céim rigairech don chath ara mbebad airdde die mór Maige Murthemne dit éis.

&ersir; cumma asrubairtsi &ersir; asbertatar na tri coicait ban baí i nEmuin
Macha o guth mór.

Ba fer na fácbaitis ar Lóeg ar iss ed naro ⋅áraigis cosindiu nert ceniuil do máthar. Acc amae ol Cu Chulaind. geib leic Loíg. la araid airitiud. la errid imdegail. la cunnid comairle. la firu ferdacht. la mná mifre. tair rium don chath. Na frithail in
n-airchisecht nachit chobradar. Tossuither in carpat éis for desel. La sin dobeir in banchuire gáir guil. La sin dobeir in banchuire gair guil &ersir; golgaire &ersir; bosschaire. Rofetatar nícon ricfed co Emuin Macha.

div1.head: Beochobra Con Culaind isind ló fúair bás.
div1.p:
IT brónaig banchuiri buidnib dér. diar n-apthaib. di maigib díe dall fríth fonúair fasciugrat ceirm co forci&ndot;gi dinn risib rot bith mairg ro fathatar flathi fer i ar &mdot;buntaib bethaed gamain íath imderga essi. Ammiti tuathchaecha taircebat mo milliud morulad atomchuinfet concechalsat buada atmbelat
eslabrai a baccaib ráth. Randfaider domun deslámaib dichra aige eblas eirr óencharpait ét im thúaith teora forranu fonena nithu. ni ciat súli ní nad aiccet. Aithguba sirechtach sercfid brú in churad o i&ndot;gnasaib. Concoillfither fír fer forgoba oin&fdot;er ecomluind ili eter da roth rosia dihal díriuch. Lorg
Léith Macha mairg ét i ssídib sies i&ndot;gantu adderga uane urchraide noes nibu thais arcuech n-aignech la dulu diluba atabiusa fri ecraitiu aithber aithber iarum dithi de lathe Mag Murthemni atharda iba srúaim sruthborr slán lam broind

begdolb crú iar feis nom &fdot;othraicfe Nith nemnech nél sorcha
somlas semide. fuile form chuirp cribsaite. cretta fuidbechta fuáim talman triuin tormaid écnaithi adrainfet comarbae cumachta. beca berthair ith amserdaib dith slabrae slab comdetae. cluim cathu canis n-imarburt. Gand gein gignithar gair ria ndomun díth. bith daer a acille bid dorcha a amser.
togaethfaid sochaide soifid iliu hé rofiastar i mbo cen athfir. Riris goí cloifid fir fessair cathu. carcair airchind imdibe ball brisiud cnama cumma tuinne tadlach sula saebrechta úabair ór urraib. arget ar crannaib. gemma a lecaib linfait saint sleibe glainithe. gressach taircsiu sáer diamlaid ar
dofessammar fair i forciund a dala lathe ‖ dia mbaidfider bith móras doine duib duile dia cennach. acht adraid in mac cona recht is ferr dúib co fa ⋅echt os mé im uabor immarordus a leic dogenaind bad &fdot;err arom beth mad cet bith. It bronaig.

Iar sin tuargabtar in banchuire gair guil &ersir; golgaire ar rofetatar
nach ricfad co Ulto Cu Chulaind.

Ro boí tech a mumme rod n-altsom ara chind forin t⋅ligid taidledsom béos in tan na theiged fora érim secci fadess &ersir; aness. Lestar co ndig leesi ara chindsom do grés. ibid dig. &ersir; documlai ass &ersir; celebraid dia mummi. Téit ass iar Sligi Midluachra. iar Maig
Mogna. Co n-accai ní na teora ammiti túathchaecha ara chind forin t⋅ligid. Orce co nemib &ersir; epthaib fonoíset for beraib cairthind. Ba do gessib Con Culaind cen adall fulachta dia chathim. Geiss dó dano cárna a chomanma do ithi. Rethid &ersir; ba do dul seccu. rufitir níbu 'c denam a lessa ro bass and. Conid de asbert friss
ind ammait. Tadall latt a Chu Chulaind. Ni adliub ém ol Cu Chulaind. Até in biad cu ol si. Diambad &fdot;ulocht mór no beth and or si ro adelta. Úair is bec fil and ni thaidle. Ni tualai&ndot;g mór nad &fdot;ulai&ndot;g ɫ nad geib in &mdot;bec. Ataellasom iarom. &ersir; tonindnaig ind ammait leithi in chon dó assa laim chlí. Adetha Cu Chulaind
iarum assa láim &ersir; dambeir fó ⋅liasait clí. Ind lám rod gab &ersir; in t⋅liasait fo tarat ro gabtha o chund co fond conna rabi a nnert cétna indib.

Documlat ass iarum iar Sligi Midluachra timchell Sleibe Fuait fades. Conid and asbert Cu Chulaind fri Loeg. Cia &fdot;acca dún
a phopa Loíg. Conid de asbert Loeg. Troich imda &ersir; mórchoscuir. Fe amae ol Cu Chulaind. Fuaim immairic eich dubderga comrethi clár clé clithi remituit a rae ar mothuittet eich i fochluib. fe. cian adraigsemar messchuriu fer &ndot;Herend. In tan dochúaid Cu Chulaind for Sligid Midluachra fodess co 'mmanaccai dó &ersir; an dunad
boí i mMaig Murthemne. Is and asbert Erc mac Carpri.

.R. Atchiusa sund carpat cóem crichid cumtachglan co pupaill uanicda co mórsaide do chlessaib cliss gascid i carput chaín chlessamna colgatchaín. Is amlaid atá in carpatsain for da n-echaib cendbeca cruindbeca corrbeca crú eich bedgaich
bolg⋅róin bolgroisc uchtlethnai brondlethnai. cidat cuibdi comriata inn echradsin nídat comdatha. indala ech díb luglíath lemnech maignech tair&ndot;gech torandchlessach stuagmar fótmar focursid. In t-ech aile i&mmacr; círdub cenand brúmar co mbrúaib duba dorchaide. Da chui&ndot;g ardda fororda foraib.
Fuil fer findcass foltlebor issin charputsin. Luinech derg daigerda na láim ar derglassad. enblaith etarluamnach uasa erra oenchairpait. Folt dúalách trí &ndot;datha fair .i. folt dond ra tuind cind. folt croderg iar n-irmedon. mind orda ra tuigedar dianechtair. Caín cocarus in chind &ersir; ind &fdot;uiltsin
co uirend teora im⋅rotha de immo chend. Comba samalta ra tétaib órsnáid dar or n-indeona fo láim suad saincherda. na ra buiderad ris taitni grian i llathi ⋅amrata i mmedón mís mai. taidlech cecha &fdot;admainni d'&fdot;uilt ind óclaígsin.
A ⋅ein chucund m fersin a &fdot;iru Herend no frithalid.

Turgabad fert fotbaig fo Erc mac Carpri in tansin. &ersir; doringintea lebend sciath imbe. &ersir; dorónta tri catha ‖ cróda comchóire do &fdot;eraib Herend in tansin. &ersir; atbert Erc. Frithalid a &fdot;iru Herend in fersin .i. Coin Culaind. &ersir; ro ráid na briathrasa.

.R. Comergid a &fdot;iru Herend. atraigid fil sund Coin
Culaind costodach coscarach claidiubderg. iraichlid erachlid. airegid. Iactbadir cind de sein ailfitir aichthi cosc n-admait ditnui taclaid ferg fair. Óenní sin amáin mac Dé mac duini. mairg mindóene mairg séis mairg sreith mairg suthchernaid

gen in flaith flaith findnélach fornélach fossad fichda fírchlich
feromail ra hart in domuin dedenaig. boí dano noí mís fo chleith ingeni détlaind bunaid. machit Macha immanar neóil slecht mairc ro chaith slecht bud adbur anmich airchind dian tic bacher Cua comergid. Comergid.

Cinnas &fdot;uirechlem. Cinnas aurisfemmar clessu ol firu Herend.
Ni handsa. Is í mo chomairlisi dúib ol Erc na cethri chuicid. filet sund di choicedaib Herend denid óenbuidin díb &ersir; óenchlár dona sciathaib immon &mdot;buidinsin anúas &ersir; imma cuairt &ersir; foraib. &ersir; tabraid triar cacha arda immon &mdot;budinsin. &ersir; dias oc imessarcain do neoch as tressiu don t⋅lúag. &ersir; cainte co culluaisc accu. Co rragbat
algis dia gaibseom féin .i. Blad ar Bladaib a ainmside. &ersir; dano co rragbat algis dona gaib indlithib dolleicther fair beus. Atá i tair&ndot;gere dia gaiseom rí do marbad de. mani gabthar algis de. &ersir; tabraid gáir guil &ersir; éigmi. ni geba in fer ara bruth &ersir; forbruth na n-ech. &ersir; ni chunnecha comlund chucaib anial ro chunnig oc Tánai
bó Cualnge. Dognither anísin amal ro rádi Erc.

Dotháet tra Cu Chulaind dochum na buidni. &ersir; dorat na trí torandchless forsin carpat .i. torandchless cet &ersir; torandchless tri cet &ersir; torandchless tri nónbur. do urscartad na slóg di Maig Murthemni. Tanic Cu Chulaind cusin &mdot;budin. &ersir; gabaid glés
n-immberta a airm forru. Is cumma no imbred na gai &ersir; in scíath &ersir; in claideb &ersir; na clessa. comtar lir gainem mara &ersir; renna nime &ersir; drucht cétamuin &ersir; loa snechtai &ersir; bommand ega. &ersir; dulli for fidbaid. &ersir; budi for Bregmaig. &ersir; fér fo chossaib grega i lló samraid a lleithchind &ersir; a llethchloicne &ersir; a llethlama. &ersir; a llethchossa. &ersir; a cnáma derga
comscaílte iarna n-esrédiud fo Mag Murthemni. &ersir; ropo liath in magsin dia n-inchinnib iarsin tress dibergesin &ersir; imberta arm dorat Cu Chulaind forru.

Iar sin co n-acca in dís ocond immessorgain cena n-etarscarad. Is mebol duit a Chu Chulaind cen etargaire na dessise ar in cainte.
La sin trá ro thairli&ndot;g Cu Chulaind chucu. &ersir; dobeir buille dia durn i cend chechtar de co tanic a n-inchind dara cluasaib &ersir; dara srónaib immach. Darónais a n-etargaire or in cainte. ni drónand nechtar de olc ria cheile. Ni betis na tost tria impide forru ar Cu Chulaind. In gaisin damsa a Chu Chulaind or in cainte. To&ndot;gimse a to&ndot;ges
mo thúath. nach mó a richtu a lessa duitseo andas damsa. Ataat fir Herend form sund &ersir; atú forro dano. Not airubsa dano mani thuca ar in cainte. Nirom aeradsa dano riam i cinaid mo drochthidnacuil.

ɫ mo dothchernais. La sodain ro díbairg in &ndot;gai dó 's a urlond reme co ndechaid triana chend. &ersir; coro marb nonbur friss anall.
Dodechaid Cu Chulaind triasin &mdot;buidin co forcend. La sin ro gab Lugaid mac Con Ruí in tres &ndot;gai n-indlithe ro boí oc maccaib Calatin. Cráet dofaeth don gaiseo a macc.u Calatin ar Lugaid.
