Dofaeth rí din gaisin or meic Calatin. Iar sin ro theilg Lugaid in &ndot;gai ‖ forsin carpat co tarlai i lLáeg mac Riangabra. co tarlaic
a mbuí do innib ina medón co rrabi for fortchi in charpait. Is and sin ro ráid Láeg. Goirt rom gaet. &ersir;c

Iar sin tra dobeir Cu Chulaind in &ndot;gai ass. &ersir; celebraid Lóeg. Conid and atbert Cu Chulaind bam eirrse &ersir; bam ara isind lathiusa indiu. In tan rosiacht Cu Chulaind co forcend na buidni. Co
n-accai in diis oc imessorgain ara bélaib &ersir; cáinte co cullúaisc oca. Is mebul duit ol indala fer a Chu Chulaind cen etairgaire etruind. La sin tarblaing Cu Chulaind chuccu &ersir; sreith cechtar de a leth co nderna brosnaig &ndot;diib immon carraic ro boí ina &fdot;arrad. In gaisin damsa a Chu Chulaind ol in cainte. To&ndot;gusa a to&ndot;ges mo thúath
ní mó richtain a lessa in gai duitsiu oldaas damsa. Cethri choicid Heren d form láim &ersir; form gail &ersir; form gaisced do aurscartad di Maig Murthemni isind lósa indiu. Nott aírubsa ol in cainte. Ni dlegar dím acht oenailgis isind losa. &ersir; dano ro íccus do chind m'enig indiu chena. Aírfatsa Ultu it chinaidsiu ol in cainte. Nira aertha ém
ríam ol se i cin mo díbese. nach mo dothchernais. A mbec arathá dī dom ⋅aegulsa ní airfaither issind lathiusa indiu. Dobert Cu Chulaind in gai dó ar urlaind co ndechaid triana chend &ersir; coro marb nónbur ris aníar. &ersir; fethid triasin &mdot;buidin amal atrubramar remaind.

Ro gab Erc mac Cairpri in tres gae indlithi ro boí oc maccaib Calatin. Cid bias din gaiseo a maccu Calatin ar Erc mac Carpri. Ni handsa. Dofuit rí din gaisin ar meic Calatin. Rochuala lib dofaíthsad din gai o chianaib ro leici Lugaid. Is fír on ém or meic Calatin. dorocliair rí arad Herend de .i. ara Con Culaind .i. Laeg
mac Riangabra. To&ndot;gus a to&ndot;ges mo thúath ni tét ar guin ríg rod mbí. La sin dolleici Erc in gai fair conid ecmai&ndot;g issin Liath Macha. Gataid Cu Chulaind in &ndot;gai ass. &ersir; celebrais cách dia cheile díb. La sodain leicthi in Liath Macha &ersir; leth a chu&ndot;ga fo

brágit co ndechaid i lLind Léith i Sliab &Fdot;uait. Is ass dodechaid
Con Culaind is inti dano dochuaid iarna guin. Conid de asbert Cu Chulaind. Rires t'ech óenchuing sunda indiu ol Cu Chulaind. La sain ataig Cu Chulaind a lethchoiss fo chend inna cu&ndot;ga. &ersir; faidid tresin &mdot;budin in n-inas cetna. Co n-acca in dís ocind immesorgain ara chind. &ersir; cainte co cullisc ocaib. Ros etarscar
iarum. &ersir; nirbo messu in t-etarscarad dorat forru andaas forsin cethrur n-aile. In gaisin damsa a Chu Chulaind ol in cainte. Ní mó a richtain a lessa duit in gai andás damsa. Not aírubsa ol in cainte. Ro íccus dom inchaib indiu. ni dlegar dam acht oenalgis isind lousa. Aírfatsa Ultu it chinta. Ro iccus dia
n-inchaib ol se. Airfatsa do chenel or in cainte. Tír ém nad ranacsa riam ní ricfat scéla m'écnaig remum. uair is bec atá dom saegul. Dotheilg Cu Chulaind in ngai dó &ersir; a urlond reme co ndechaid triana chend &ersir; tré trí nonboru aile. Is rath co feirg a Chu Chulaind ar in cánti.

Iar sin tra luid Cu Chulaind aridisi tresin &mdot;buidin co forcend. Iar sin dano ro gab Lugaid in tres gai indlithi ra boí oc maccaib Calatin. Cid bias din gaiseo a maccu Calatin Tuitfid rí de ar meic Calatin. Rochuala lib dofáethsad din gai ro leci Erc imbuaruch. Is fir ón or se darochair rí ech Herend de .i. in Liath
Macha. To&ndot;gusa a tonges mo thuath ní taít ar guin ríg rod bí. La ssin dolléci ‖ Lugaid in &ndot;gai do Choin Culaind co n-ecmoi&ndot;g ind co tarlaic anro buí ina broind co rrabi for fortchi in charpait. La sin dolluid in Dub Sai&ndot;glend úad co lleith a chunga co lluid i lLoch &ndot;Dub i crích Muscraige Tíre. Is ass dodechuid dochum
Con Culaind. Is and luid aridisi coro &fdot;ichi in loch la sodain.

Iar sain tra tarrasair in carpat a oínur forsin maig. Iar sin atbert Cu Chulaind. Rop ail damsa ol Cu Chulaind dul connici in loch ucut d'ól digi ass. Is cet lind ar iat acht co tís chucund aridisi. Forcongersa foruib or Cu Chulaind mani thísiursa féin
co tistaisi armo chend.

Iar sin tra ro theclaim inne a brond ina ucht. &ersir; téit ass dochum ind locha. Amal ro n-ánic in loch ataig a láim sethno a brond co fargab anro boí do indib ina broind. Ibid dig iarum &ersir; fothruci ass. Is de atá Loch Lámraith i mMaig Murthemni. Ainm aile
dó dano Loch Tondchuil. Iar sin docuridar bedg ass. &ersir; forco&ndot;gair foraib co ndigsitis ara chend.
Dodechaid iarum crích mór ond loch síar. &ersir; rucad a rosc airi. &ersir; téit dochum coirthi cloiche file isin maig co tarat a choimchriss

immi nar ablad na ⋅uidiu nach ina ligu. combad ina ⋅essam atbalad.
Is iar sin dodechatar na fir imma cuairt immi &ersir; niro lamsatar dul a dochum. Andar leo ropo beo. Is mebol dúib ol Erc mac Carpri cen chend ind &fdot;ir do thabairt lib i ndigail chind m'atharsa rucad leis coro adnacht fri airsce Echdach Nia Fer. Rucad a chend assaide co fil i Síd Nenta iar nUsciu.

Iar sin tra dodechaid in Líath Macha co Coin Culaind dia imchomét i céin ro boí a anim and &ersir; ro mair in lon láith assa étun. Is iarum birt in Liath Macha na tri dergruathra immi ma cuairt. co torchratar .l. leis cona &fdot;iaclaib. &ersir; xxx. cach cruí dó iss ed ro marb don t⋅lúag. Conid de atá nitathe buadremmend ind Léith Macha iar marbad
Con Culaind. Conid iar sin dolluid ind ennach fora gualaind. Nirbo gnáth in corthe út fo enaib ar Erc mac Corpri. Iar sin tra ra choraig Lugaid a moi&ndot;g dara aiss. &ersir; benaid a chend de. Iar sin tra dorochair a chlaideb a llaim Con Culaind co n-eccmoi&ndot;g a láim doí di Lugaid co rrabi for lár. Benair a lám doí dano di
Choin Culaind dia digail.

Documlat ass iarum in t⋅lúaig &ersir; doberat leo cend Con Culaind &ersir; a laim dói co tancatar Temraig. Conid and atá otharlige a chind &ersir; a láime doí. &ersir; lán lainne a scéith di úir. Conid de asbert Ceiid Faelad mac Ailella. i nAidedaib Ulad.

lg.l: for Mac Tri Con for Lugthig.

div1.p:
Iar sin documlat in t⋅lúaig ass fades co rancatar abaind Lifi.
Amal rancatar in n-abaind ‖ asbert Lugaid fria araid. Is trom lim mo chriss lán immum ol se. Is áil dam mo &fdot;othrucud. Docuredar ass erchomuir in t⋅lúaig. Fothraicid iarum. Documlaiset ass iar suidiu. Atetha íach etera da cholptha. docuiredar suas dia araid. benaidside tenid dia urgnum fo chetóir.

Is iar sin documlat slúaig Ulad atúaid o Emuin Macha dochum Sleibe Fuait iar cur a cessa díb. Ro boí cinniud tria chombáig iarum eter Choin Culaind &ersir; Conall Cernach .i. ciped chia díb no marbtha ar tús a digail dia cheiliu. &ersir; mad misse marbthair ar tús ar Cú Chulaind cia luathe nom dígela. A lla not gentar ar
Conall Cernach do digai; damsa resin fescursin. &ersir; mad misse marbthair and or Conall. cia luathe nom digéla. Nipa úar th'&fdot;uilsiu limsa for talmain ol Cu Chulaind in tan not digél.

In tan iarum dodechaid Conall Cernach resin slúag ina charput co comarnic frisin Liath Macha &ersir; a thoesca fola tríít oc dul do Lind
Léith. Conid and asbert Conall Cernach.

.R. Ni cumgid cui&ndot;ge co lLind Léith co rrega co fuilib fonnaide fo chollaib clí co fuidlechtaib fuili fir sceo eich im láim doí Lugdach. Lugaid mac Con Ruí meic Dare iss e ro marb mo chomaltsa Coin Culaind.

Luid íar sin Conall Cernach &ersir; in Liath Macha reme coro lá cuairt sinn arbaig. Co n-accatar Coin Culaind immon corthe. Luid dano in Líath Macha co tarat a chend for brunnib Con Culaind. Is dethitiu don Liath Macha in corp út ar Conall. Téit tra Conall iar tain. &ersir; ataig a thraig fri airrbe. To&ndot;gusa a to&ndot;ges mo thúath.
ar se. rop airrbe ro&fdot;ir in so. Ro batsis ainm dond inud ol in druí. Bid ed ainm in tiriseo co bráth. Airrbe Ro&fdot;ir.

Tocumlaí iarum i ndegaid in t⋅lúaig. Is and ro boí Lugaid oca &fdot;othrucud. Decce dún a mmag ol Lugaid fria araid na tistar chucund cen aicsin. Doféccai secha in t-ara. Dofil oenmarcach
sund chucund or se. &ersir; is mór a. gripe &ersir; a luas dothet. indar lat is feochuine Herend fil uasa. Indar lat it loa snectai breccait a mmag fris anair. Ní inmain in marcach dothaet and ar Lugaid .i. Conall Cernach in sin forsin Deirg Druchtais. Na eoin atchonnarcais uasu. na fóit a cruib ind eichsin. na loa snechtai
atchonnarcais do breccad in maige friss anair. uanbach a bélaib ind eichsin. &ersir; a gglomraib in t⋅réin. Fég darisse ar Lugaid cisi chonar dotháet. Dotháet dochum ind atha ar in t-ara .i. in chonar dodechaid in slúag. Dolléic sechund in t-echsin ar Lugaid ní áil dún comrac fris.

In tan iarum rosiacht Conall Cernach co medón ind átha doféccai secha dé de araid sucut ar se. Dofeccai secha in tres fecht. Dé de rig sút ar se. Is ferr damsa a adall. Adella cuccu. Is fo- chen aged &fdot;écheman. ol Conall Cernach. Intí dano dia ndligi &fdot;iachu dosfothlaig fair. Dligim dítsu ar Conall Cernach .i. marbad
mo chomcheili Con Culaind &ersir; itú ic triall a acrai &fdot;ort. Ní cóir ón or Lugaid ar ní armide ar laechdacht duitsiu comrac frimsa sund co rrí búaid mo choscair lim tír Muman. Dogénaindse mani beth techt dún for oenchonair &ersir; i comlabrai &ersir; i cotchennas or Conall Cernach. Nipa hansa a mbia di ⋅udiu or Lugaid. Regatsa
amne for Belach Gabrúain co ndechus for Belach Smechuin. Airgsiu amne for Gabuir for Mairg Lagen co comairsem i mMaig Argetrois. Lugaid is é cetaranic. Tanic a cheile ina diaid .i. Conall Cernach. Tarlaic urchor fair ‖ dia ⋅lig. &ersir; a choss frisin coirthe fil i mMaig Argetrois co ndecmaing i lLugaid conid de
atá Corthe Lugdach i mMaig Argetrois.

Luid iarum iarna chétguiniu co mboí oc Fertai Lugdach i nDroictib Ossairge. Conid and immanarraid dóib. Rop áil damsa or Lugaid conum rabad fir fer úaitsiu. Cid ón or Conall Cernach. Connacham thised úait acht oenlám. ar ní &fdot;il acht oenlám lim. Rot bia or
Conall Cernach. Ce&ndot;galtar a lám iarum dia thóeb co suanemnaib. Ro batar ind sin eter da thráth din ló. &ersir; ni &fdot;uair nechtar de eill fora cheile. In tan nad &fdot;úair Conall Cernach eill fair dofeccai secha a gabuir .i. in Deirg &ndot;Druchtaig. Cend con furriside. for- dibad na firu isna cathaib &ersir; isna irgalaib. La sin donic in gabuir
chuci corra gaib mír assa thoíb co tarlaic inna raba ina broind co rraba imma chossa. Fe amae or Lugaid ní fír fer anísin a Chonaill Chernaig. Ni tharddusa duitsiu or Conall Cernach act darmo chend féin. Ni tharddus i&mmacr; duit dar cend na robb &ersir; na n-ecodnach. Ro&fdot;etursa tra or Lugaid nad ragasu co rruca mo
chendsa latt. uair dofucsamni cend Con Culaind. Co tardda trá ar se mo chendsa ar do chend &ersir; co n-erbara mo rígise fordo ríge. &ersir; mo gaisced fordo gaisced. Ar is ferr limsa combad tú laech bad dech no beth i nHerind. La ssin benaid Conall Cernach a chend de.

Tocumlai ass iarum cosin cend leiss. Co comarnic fri Ulto i rRoirind hi tirib Lagen. Forruimther a cend forsin chloich &ersir; ro dermatad and. Co rrancatar Gris. Is and sin imchoemnacair Conall Cernach. in tuc nech uaib a cend ar se. Ni thucsam ar cách. Is and asbert Conall Cernach. To&ndot;gusa a to&ndot;ges mo thúath
or se ní midbine in sin. Is de atá Midbine oc Roirind. Tintaiset dochum in chind arise. Co n-accas ní ro berbai in cend in cloich co ndechaid treithe. Niro damsat Ulaid co mbuaid choscair do Emuin Macha in t⋅echtmainsin. Ro damastar i&mmacr; anim Con Culaind co tarfád don .l. rígan ro ⋅araigestar a llaa re tuidecht don chath.
Co n-accas ní Cu Chulaind ina ⋅iaburcharput isind aeór os Emuin Macha. Conid and ro chan Cu Chulaind dóib co n-erbairt iarna eistecht.

Eomuin Eomuin. oll olleith. tan ré Talcind trebfait iathu Emna. ticfat de Eoraip Elpae. di usciu ethar domuin
dobním co sluagaib Succet sailiu gil gigsit co rríg n-ardnime alchel coton Sion suidigthe leis raigma do lathiu lanbratha. Fer cain co&ndot;geba frim anair isind oínmaig. maith in sin co comairsem a Emain.

div1.head: Siaburchobra Con Culaind i llathiu a éitsechta.
div1.p:
Úaine ortae a Eomuin. Ditiu ortae Eomuin. ar cleith doclast a Eomuin. Docer i cath a Eomuin. ciab oen fri iliu. do loeg dofuart firu. Uaine ortae Eomuin. dofias mór fer mar fer mart. forriadam réim n-erchían ar ba rom ron traethad. Toret im gáir &ndot;gubae. Cain aindrae dun subae. Setu
finna. forcu Dechtire. duin deme. dimemed art uasal. mad arg n-erred. rissed do fius már fer mart. Mad oen fri oen n-uathad admuind findmac nEithnend. Cach cruth cach leth robae ro fertad fer Aife. Atbath Loeg iruilled nach bad trummu turbaid to&mmacr; mo chaurchobraid Conall
conoí lui&ndot;g lúath o Ultaib echraid echlaig dilind duib a mMuig Eo i mMaig Cride. U.

div1.head: Cu Chulaind atbert. De aduentu Christi.
div1.p:
CRist cetarét iathu écmacht n-anfót frecnairc ‖ fallnabthair ar chenel fechid. ar chel coemrí Comdiu
ísund úasund athardae domoin do imdún duin fri nelbruig nia doíne ticfa a recht cach leth linfaid. lenfaid. do thogaís. troethfaid Isu iffern. imergib áil Ádaim i flaith forbais foláim fris mbet formdig ingair fris failtniget fris raidfet recht nime. cia riseo cia tuili. dia n-eperat arbuir in rí ro ícc talmain ar
flaith fordonosdá. ar ríchid natesbaí do foirm nert nime la forlinad suide séis for dindaib flatha. in rí iar &mdot;búaid chatha. oenaib. dedaib tredaib tria chumachta nat erglond. nad ecguth. nad erbur. Dall taidbsiu do doínib. robud ria. mbás. bias renna nime. Fochroithfet. grian gel inderg dithsir réim
&ndot;glas rotha resair esce foleth luigther in luachthaidiu amser tria. torromu. Ísu as uasliu. as isliu tria erscartad
iffirn. tria ⋅uidigud suide tria thuaslucud flatha. tria lanarbur catha. tria lanchumacta nime im nimib. im doine im duile im bethu tria bithu. Crist.
Luid in Liath Macha do chelebrad do Emir. Co tara a chend ina hucht. &ersir; dochuaid ina dessel fo thrí. &ersir; desel Dúin Imrid. &ersir; Duin Delga.

div1.head: Nuallguba Emire in so.
div1.p:
A Leith Macha mór n-essad. mór &ndot;dirsan. mór &ndot;galgat.
. mór mairg. nodat décai immuddidnad nachitoisci cotuteilged eirr chain chumachtach cathbuadach uas do chlíu nad chliss crichbrugi Macha meic hui Nendrúaid. nél find forétis ríg side seol n-óir uas dindaib. ar thuathaib ilib imgonad gein óir uas t'anail ar faebraib fechaid forrúair dubu Delgae
dilachtai. Torreith rig eirr sceo bás rí ech uas echaib. uas bemmennaib oc buadaib oc foromnaib for énaib. Nit ecmai&ndot;g fleisc na urlond. na urchor. nit ecmaing fein clí congaibed ferna aurdloctai. nit ecmoi&ndot;g dess dia mbenad bidbadu. fordombenad a bunad immumdiched a urúath nam biathad a
aruit. ardum cetmunter caín cathbuadach. ciallastar iar dun chath chruaid. n-oenguine. Atambebai ecomlund i cétaine. i cétlathiu &fdot;ogomuir eirr broga Murthemni millsit ammaiti dichimmid n-etain. granne genite. cruan cern Con Culaind cathbuadaig. Car in mete nasad mo miad no mét no gal no
gart no grád. no gním. inid Cu Chulaind cathbuadach ocona ragaib ré. Rolá ár do Galianaib fri Hernu. Ros mbí Eraind arid &mdot;bebsat bás. Ar rofitir eirr chaín chumachtach chathbuadach co ngressed grissaib clóitis riana gail gabais immi ecóir ara torchair a scíath. ara n-imgaib a ech.
athcummai a delg. Dolluid adollus ara thethraig a nert nach &ndot;derbai dia chéim. Co farnaic ammaiti tuathchaecha ara chind. cu glas fonoiset fri tindell a cliu do cossecht. foa ur⋅eilb oa bund coa mullach corbo marb a leth laith gaile. friasa comarnic. co torchair a ech ainmem. Liath leggur
Dub Aiglend. olc lige adbul sluag doceir ciarbo oenchossid oenlámaid dithrachtai dia oenuch.

Ro marb Cu Chulaind .uiii. Láith. uiii. Níaith .uiii. Feci .uiii. nOengusa .uiii. Fiachaig .uiii. Fergusa .uiii. Faelgusa .x. &mdot;Brudi .x. &mdot;Bróin .x. &mdot;Brenaind .x. Corpri .x. Crimthaind .x. Conaire
.x. Conaill .ix. truich .ix. &ndot;druid. ix. &ndot;Doelgusa .ix. Saergusa .ix. nIllaind. xɫ. arad .xɫ. brolach .xl. brugad. cét mulach .c. &ndot;díbergach .c. sen. c. n-óc .c. midais .xx. ríg. xx. colomon. xx. eirred án. xx. olloman. im ocht cét lam &ndot;dess do imdibe. Im ocht cét súle clé do chaechad co fargaib in sluagsin uile fo anim dia éis issind
oenló., ‖

Apraind a Léith Macha nabu díb n-echaib commaib fo charput ba sodursan. napu díb lamaib comlánaib comarnic. Apraind nach Conchobor claidebruad comairlestar. Dursan nad Eirrge Echbel arnic. Apraind nach Sencha Sobeóil
rosiacht. Dursan nach Fiacha Foltlebor fallnastar. Apraind nach Eogan Alaind acillestar. Dursan nach Fergna mac Findchaeme forcmastar. Apraind nach Fergus mac Lete luid. Apraind nach Feidlimid Faeborderg forcachai. Dursan nach Munremur morglonnach miadaigestar. Apraind nach
Amargin urdairc aigestar. Dursan nach Rochad Rigderg rathaigestar. Apraind nad bátar errid Ulad uile ocond airm i torchair i n-écomlund. ar no reidedsom a chorp &ndot;gel chrechtach ar Ultu fri iltuathu ilairbriu. Dursan nach Conall Cernach cobrastar. Apraind nach Celtchair comrach cuala. Dursan
nach Loegaire Buadach báigestar. Apraind nach Fergus mac Rossa roacht. Dursan nad batar Ulaid uile imme airm i torchair.

Domchommart a chuma. cotomessart a díth. Rom dithracht a díbad. Am dímain dia éis. ar nimda ni iarum. Ba meite
cach cride rod car con bossad. ba meite cech cluas rodcuala co bráth noco ndermanad. Ba meite cach dér no cíthe co bráth ba dia bithchoíniud. Ba meite cach rosc atconnairc no ciad frassaib fola. ar is dered fo dubai in domain dia eis. Ar niba fri ceili aile iarum nom accfither. Nibat gárechtaig
aiscedaig fergnúsi ocom urnaidm. Ar ní fugeb céli fri Coin Culaind cosmail.

Bit bronaig delguin dilactai. nibat failti buad bantrochta dobeba Mis Gegra gnimrathu. rogní mordígail. Adrulaid lumg mossad morgnima i mMaig &Sdot;iamrach ro sephaid Conall iar Cormac
comaitecht conderaig a daltae digairsi mór gein ro gabai ar galaib oen&fdot;ir iar &mdot;breth ban side siachtum mórthochmarc

meic dea Dechtiri derbad Soaltim. sainaltram Loga imréith fri mind rotha Scaithchi scelaige. eochraide inna nUlad n-úath oa n-athaib. teist ro &fdot;ersur ré siabordai ina urchomair
sé mbliadna déc dlegma scur. saetha sechmai morthuatha. alchél cach uand dia éol immaciam. immacaínem. immanairchisem. Is truag in bith atáthar and. ar ni chomraicfeni nach laithiu aile. a Leith., A Leith. Finit. Amen.

div1.head: .Aided Choncobuir.
div1.p:
BAi mesca mór for Ulto fecht n-and i nEmain Macha. Docuridar dī immarbaga móra &ersir; comrama eturro .i. eter Chonall &ersir; Coin Culaind &ersir; Loegaire. Tucaid damsa ar Conall inchind Mess Gegra coro acilliur ócu na comram. Ba bes d'Ultaib ind inbaidsin
cach curaid no marbdais ar galaib oen&fdot;ir no gatta a n-inchind assa cendaib &ersir; commesctha ael airthib co ndenad liathroite cruade díb. &ersir; in tan no bítis i n-immarbaig no chomramaib dobertis dóib co mbítis inna lamaib.

Maith a Chonchobuir ar Conall naco ndernat oic na comram
echt fon innasa ar galam oín&fdot;ir. nidat tual&ndot;gi comram frimsa. Is fir ón ar Conchobor. Doratad iarum forsin forud fora mbid do grés ind inchind. Luid cách a lethi arnabarach dia cluchiu. Dolluid dano Cet mac Matach do chuairt ectra la Ulto. Beist ass andsam ro boí i nHerind ‖ in Cet. Is ed dolluidside dar
faidchi na hEmna &ersir; tri laechcind leis do Ultaib. In tan bátar na ónmite co cluchiu do inchind Mes Gegra. Iss ed atbert ind ónmit fri araile. Rocluinedar Cet anísin. Ethaidside in n-inchind a lláim indala n-aí &ersir; berid leis. O rofitir Cet ro boí i tar&ndot;gere do Mess Gegra a digail iarna écaib. Cach cath &ersir; cach irga no bíd
do Chonnachtaib fri Ulto dobered Cet in n-inchind inna chriss dús in tetarthad écht n-amra d'Ultaib do marbad di.

Fecht and dī dolluidseom intí Cet sair co tuc tánai &mdot;bó a Feraib Ross. Donarraid i n-iarmoracht Ulaid ina diaid. Doriachtatar dano Connachtai dond leith aile dia thessaircainseom. Fechair
cath eturro. Dolluid Conchobor féin issin cath. Conid and sin gadatar mna Connacht do Chonchobur tuidecht for leith do descin a delba dóib. Fo bíth ni rabi for talmain delb duini amal deilb

Conchobuir .i. eter chruth &ersir; deilb &ersir; dechelt. eter mét &ersir; córe &ersir; cutrummae. eter rosc &ersir; &fdot;olt &ersir; gile. eter gaís. &ersir; alaig. &ersir; erlabra. eter
erriud &ersir; áne &ersir; écosc. eter arm &ersir; immad &ersir; orddan. eter gnais &ersir; gaisced &ersir; chenel. Nirbo lochtach trá intí Conchobor. A comairli i&mmacr; in Cheit ro gabsat na mná ailgis do Chonchobur. Luid iarum for leth a oínur dia descin dona mnaib.

Dolluid Cet i&mmacr; co mbuí eter na mná i mmedón. Nos indlethar
Cet inchind Mes Gegra isin tábaill. &ersir; nos teilc conid tarla i mmullach Conchobuir co mbátar a da trian inna chind &ersir; co torchairseom isa cend co tarla fri lár. Focherddat Ulaid chuci conid rucsat o Chet. For brú Átha Daire da Báeth is and dorochair Conchobor. Atá a lige and baile i torchair &ersir; corthe fria chend &ersir; corthe fria
chossa.

Maidid tra for Connachta co Sciaid Aird na Con. Dobertar Ulaid sair doridisi co Áth Daire Da Báeth. Mo brithse ass ar Conchobor. Dobér ríge nUlad do neoch nom béra connici mo thech. Not bersa ar Cend Berraide ar a gilla fadéin. Dobeirside
lomain imme &ersir; no mbeir fora muin co Arddachad Slebe Fúait. Maidid a chride isin gillu. Conid desin atá ríge Cind Berraide for Ultaib .i. in rí fora muin leth ind laí. Conócbad trá in debaid on tráth co araile dar éis in ríg. Co raimid for Ulto iar sin.

Doberar tra a liaig co Conchobor .i. Fingen. Iss eside no &fdot;innad
don diaid no theiged don tig. in lín no bíd i &ndot;galur sin tig. &ersir; cech galar no bíd and. Maith or Fingen dia taltar in chloch asdo chind biat marb fo chetóir. Mani tucthar ass i&mmacr; not ícfaind. &ersir; bid athis duit. Is asso dún ar Ulaid ind athis oldás a écsom.

Ro iccad iarum a chend &ersir; ro fuaged co snáth óir ar ba cumma
dath fuilt Conchobuir &ersir; dath inn óir. &ersir; asbert in liaig fri Conchobor co mbeth i fomtin .i. arna tísad a &fdot;erg dó &ersir; na digsed for ech &ersir; na etraiged mnai co anfeta &ersir; na rethed.

Ro boí dano isin chuntabairtsin céin robo beo .i. uii. &mdot;bliadna &ersir; nirbo e&ndot;gnamaid acht a airisium inna ⋅uidi namma .i. naco cuala
Crist do chrochad do Iudaidib. Tanic andside crith mór forsna dúli &ersir; ro chrithnaig nem &ersir; talam la mét in gníma darónad and .i. Ísu Crist mac Dé bí do chrochad. ‖ cen chinaid. Craet so ar Conchobor fria druid. Cia olc mór dognither isind lathiusa indiu. Is fír on ém ar in druí. Is mór in gnímsin ar Conchobor. In
fersin dano ar in druí i n-oenaidchi ro gein &ersir; rogenisiu .i. in .uiii. kɫ enair cencop inund bliadain.
Is and sin ro chreiti Conchobor. &ersir; iss ésin indara fer ro chreti
do Dia i nHerind ria tiachtain creitmi é .i. Morand in fer aile. Maith tra ar Conchobor.

.R. Ba hapraind na dáil cu ardríg. nar nagg atumbeoir i rricht chruadchurad cichtis cichtis mo beoil concichlais crúas mór miled. maidm nitha múaid nim⋅lóig serbairlech. sordnifed soerchobair la Crist co&ndot;genaind. gair báeth baruléim for leth ain lan Chomded lanscél cé chointir crochad ríg
ba moo coirp a rí ardrach adamrai. tumcichthe in gním i tinol tairisem treóin uasal i Coimded coimthecht co&ndot;gnam caín bé la Dia dilgadach dia chobair. caín forlund fóberaind. caín comlund crothfind Crist ar nemthuir. nipu scíth ce chéssaitís coirp chriad. ciarbo ar Crist cáid cumachtach cia
dú dún nad rochem rád dúr derchointe ru n-ortar inarmen mona miad nad ríg roachtmar ron cráidi crochad Crist ma chotócbaimmis ba hassu nad bemmis iar n-ardrach ecomnart uasal rí ro cés croich cruaid ar doine digmaig dia ráith ragaindse bás achtu flaith for leccaind fochil n-éca nabu ní
nemthuir necht remiteised do choimrid mo chride clúas in ardrach &ndot;guba armu Dia indscib nad ríg roacht co fír fortacht fritumthá brón báis conatbiur ar omun dom dul druib. cen Dulemain digail.

Is and doringni Conchobor in rethoricse diaro innis Bachrach
druí de Lagnib do Chonchobur Crist do chrochad. Diara iarfaig Conchobor ciata airde i&ndot;gantacha so. &ersir;c. ɫ dano combad é Altus in consul dodechaid o Ochtauin do chungid in chisa co Gaedelaib no innised do Chonchobur Cridt do chrochad.,

div1.head: Aided Meidbe.
div1.p:
CID dia tá aided Meidbe ingine Echdach Feidlig a Temraig. Trí meic &Fdot;ind .i. Conall Anglonnach &ersir; Eochaid Find &ersir; Eochaid Feidlech. Tri meic dano la Eochaid Feidlech &ersir; tri ingena. Na tri meic. Bres &ersir; Nár &ersir; Lothur .i. na Trí Find Emna. Na tri ingena .i. Eithni Uathach &ersir; Medb Cruachan &ersir; Clothro Cruachan
dia n-ebrad.

In Chlothru dano is sí banrígan i Cruachain riasiu no gabad Medb flathius ar ecin ón o Echdaig. Batar tri meic Echdach oc
triall ríge do gait ara n-athair. Dolluid Clothru dia tairmesc &ersir; dia codnugud. Araisom dano dofocrait cath for Eochaid. Dolluid Clothro ara cind. In do ⋅árgud far n-athar duib ar si. Is anfír mór cia dognether. Is ecen tra ar ind oic. In facbaid iartaigi etir ar in ben. Ní morithir or ind oic. Is doich tuittim dúib
trianafar n-anfír. Taít chucumsa ar si or is inbaid comperta dam. dús in faicfid iartaige lim. Dognither on. Luid cach fer ar n-úair díb cucci. co mbaí maith de .i. Lugaid Riab &ndot;Derg mac na Tri Find Emna. Na taít a fectsa ar sisi i n-agid for n-athar. Is lór d'anfír dúib comrac riafar siair cenco tisaid do chath ria-
far n-athair. Iss ed tra sin ro thairmisc ‖ iat de choscur in chatha. Is and dī domeled Clothru dligeda Connacht i n-Inis Clothrand for Loch Rí. Asberatsum tra is Medb ros marbsi. &ersir; is triana taíb tucsat na claidib in Furbaide mac Conchobuir. Gabais indí Medb rige Connacht iar tain &ersir; dobert Ailill i flaithemnas chuci.
&ersir; is i nInis Clothrand domeledsi dligeda Connacht. &ersir; ba geis dissi cena fothrucud cecha maitni assin tiprait ar dorus na indsi.

Luid dī Furbaide fecht and co hInis Clothrand. &ersir; saidid cualli forsind licc forsa ndenad Medb a fothrucud. &ersir; ro che&ndot;gail suanemain do chind in chualli .i. cualli ba comard ri Meidb.
&ersir; sínid in suanemain dar Loch Rí síar &ersir; sair. Berid leis in suanemain dia thaig. In tan iarum no bitis macrad Ulad oca cluchi ba é cluchi Furbaide no ⋅íned a ⋅uanemain eter da chualli &ersir; no bid oc díburgud eturro &ersir; ni anad co n-ermaised in ubull no bíd for cind in chualli.

Fecht and di boí dál mór eter Connachtu &ersir; Ultu im Loch Rí aníar &ersir; anair. &ersir; dorala Medb oca fothrucud matain moch assin tiprait osin loch cetna. Is alaind in delb út or cách. Cia sin ar Furbaide. Siúr do máthar or cách. Boíseom oc ithi blogi do thanaig. Niro ansom dī ri cungid clochi. Dobeir in &mdot;bloig
isin tabaill. Oro boí a hetan Meidbi friu. dosleici in &mdot;bloig conid n-ecmai&ndot;g ina mullach. Conid romarb dond óenurchur i ndigail a mathar.
Aided Meidbe in sin.,

Derb &Fdot;orgaill ingen ríg Lochlainne ro charastar Coin Culaind
ara urscelaib. Dolluid anair i rricht da géise &ersir; a hinailt co mbátar for Loch Cuan &ersir; rond óir eturru. Amal ro boí dano Cu Chulaind &ersir; Lugaid a dalta .i. mac na Tri Find Emna laa and la toíb ind locha co n-accatar na heonu. Dibairg na heonu or Lugaid. Dolleici Cu Chulaind cloich forru co ndechaid etera hasna
co mboí ina broind. Bátar da deilb duine issin tracht fo chetóir. olc robá rim ar ind ingen. &ersir; is tú doroacht. Is fír ar Cu Chulaind. Ro ⋅úgi iarum a tóeb na ingine in cloich co mbuí ina beolu cosin loim chró roboí impe. Is dot insaigid tánacsa tra or si. Nathó a ingen or se. In tóeb ro ⋅úgiusa or se ní chomraiciubsa riss.
Dombéraso dano do neoch bas maith let. Is maith limsa ém or se dul duitsiu cosin mac as soíriu fil i nHerind .i. Lugaid Riab &ndot;Derg. Maith lim or si acht conot accur do grés. Luid iarum co Lugaid co rruc claind dó.

Laa and dī i nderiud gemrid. snecta mór and. Doniat na
fir corthe mór don t⋅nechtu. Lotar na mna forna corthe. Ba he a tuscurnud. Tabram ar mún isin coirthe dús cia as sia ragas ind. In ben o ría triit is í as &fdot;err co&ndot;gaib úan. Ni roacht dī uadib. Co&ndot;gairther Derb Forgaill uadib. Nirbo áill lea or nirbo baeth. Téit arai forsin corthe ro selaig uade co talam. Dia
fessatar trá ind &fdot;ir so nícon grádaigfider i fail na oínmná. Gatair a súile assa cind. &ersir; a sróna &ersir; a da n-ó &ersir; a trilis. Niba soaccobraite ón. Dognither a pianad amlaidsin. &ersir; berair iar tain da tig. Batar ind &fdot;ir is tilaig i ndáil os Emain. Is i&ndot;gnad lem a Lugaid ar Cu Chulaind snechta for taig Derb Forgaill. Is i n-écaib atási dī ar
Lugaid. Tiagait for comluath dochum in taige. Amal rochualasi ón dunaid a tech furri. Oslaic ar Cu Chulaind. Caín bláth forro scarsam or si. Is and asbert.

lg.l: is delg i cridi cró cnis.
Cu Chulaind do bith i n-i&ndot;gnais.
fri mac na Tri Find Emna.
Buaid gaile buaid clis ria cách
do Choin Culaind cruth rod n-aí.
buaid mo chrotha sech cech mnaí.
cach trén bid truag ɫ bid trú.
ni sét fris nem nech dogní;
gnúis chaín cid alaind a lí.
iss ed ba slán lam chride
ro delbad dam dul ar cel. C.

div1.p:
Iss ed atberatsom ní baí a hanim intisi in tan tancatarsom
is tech innund. Asberat dano ba marb Lugaid a chetoir oca descin . Luid i&mmacr; Cu Chulaind isa tech cosna mná co tarat a tech forthu conna tudchid fer na ben i mbethaid assin tigsin .i. dona tri coicdaib rigan. acht ros marb uile. Is and asbert Cu Chulaind.

lg.l: ba rath carat ro dam fír.

div1.p:
Derb .i. Dér ingen Forgaill rig Lochlainne. Rolad a fert &ersir; a
llia la Coin Culaind.

NOinden Ulad cid dia tá. Ni handsa. Crunniuc mac Agnomain di Ultaib briuga cetach atacomnaic. Baí i ndithrub &ersir; i rroilbib &ersir; meic imda leis. Ba marb iarum a ben. Tan buí lathe and ina thig a oínur. co n-accai in mnai chuce ina thech.
Ba cuchtach leis innas na mná. Fecaid in ben fo chetóir. o dofessid for ergnam do denam. amal bid is taig no beth riam. O thanic co aithchi donairbir in muntir cen athchomarc. Foaid la Crunniuc isind aidchi. Baí oca amser már iar sin &ersir; ni buí ní ba terc dóib leesi di cach thorud eter biad &ersir; etach &ersir; indbass. Nibá cian iar sin
ferthair oenach la Ultu. No thegtis Ulaid dond oenuch. fiur mnai mac ingin. Farruma dano Crunniuc la cach dond oenuch. Etach maith immi. bláth maith fair. Is tacair duit trá ol a ben friss ni &fdot;orbara anfót do rád. Is decmai&ndot;g ón ol seseom. ‖ Curthir a n-oenach. doberar carpat ind ríg forsin &mdot;blai deod laí. Dobert
búaid in carpat cona echaib. Asbert in sluag ni fuil ní as lúathiu andáit na eichseo. Asbert Crunniuc is luathiu mo bensa ol seseom. Airgaibthersom lasin ríg fo chetóir. Adfiadar don mnai anísin. Is turbaid ém damsa ol si dul dia &fdot;uaslucudsom &ersir; mé alacht. Cid turbaid ol in tectaire mairfithirsium meni risiu.

Tolluidsi dond oenuch iarum. et ros gabat idain. Tomforidse ol si risin sluag or is mathair ruc cách uaib. Anaid frim coro lamnar. Ro &fdot;émid uadib. Maith tra ol si biaid olc bas mó de. &ersir; biaid for Ultaib uile re mór. Cia th'ainmsiu ol in rí. Iss ed mo ainmse ol si &ersir; ainm mo gene bias arin oenuchsa co bráth. Macha
ingen Sainrith meic Imbaith m'ainmse ol si. Comluid iarum frisin carpat. &ersir; in tan roanic in carpat cend na blae ro scáich a asaitsi ara chind. co mbert emun .i. mac &ersir; ingen. Is de atá Emuin Machae in sin. Iactaidsi dano lia hasait. nach duine rodachúala son foscerded i cess. cóic laa &ersir; cethri aídche. Fir Ulad uili ro
batar and dosniced uili do grés ind ellsin. fri saegul nónbair o cach &fdot;iur ro baí and. Cóic laa &ersir; cethri aidche. ɫ coic aidche &ersir; cethri laa. iss ed sin ro boí noinden Ulad. Nert mna siúil ba hed no bíd

la cech fer di Ultaib fri saegul nonbair. isind noenden. Treide forna bíd noenden di Ultaib .i. meic &ersir; mnaa Ulad &ersir; Cu Chulaind.
Iss ed heret ro mbaí for Ultaib. ó amsir Cruincon meic Agnomain meic Curir Ulad meic &Fdot;iatach meic Urmi. conice amsir &Fdot;orco meic Dalláin meic Mainich meic Lugdach. &ersir;c. Curir Ulad is de dogairter Ulaid.
Is desin tra atá Noenden Ulad &ersir; Emuin Macha.

CIA treide cetna labratar iarna genemain fó chétoir &ersir; cid ro labraiset. Ni handsa. Aí mac Olloman meic Delbaith. &ersir; Morand mac Cairpri Chind Chaitt. &ersir; Noinniu Noíbrethach. Is de chetus ro labrastar Óe macc Olloman .i. Baí Fiachu mac Delbaith rí Herend for cuairt ríg &ersir; a bráthair na &fdot;arrad .i. Olloni mac
Delbaith. Batar laa and ic tomailt i nInis Tige i n-iarthur Herend .i. in rí Fiachu &ersir; a brathair Ollom. Leth in tige oc cechtar de. A druí dano for belaib ind ríg .i. Fiachach. Oro bátar oc tomailt a fessi dothaet athach gaethe móre tarsin tech. conos tarat uile i socht mór niét in delma. Cid forcanas ind athach ar Fiachu frisin druid.
Iss ed &fdot;orcanas or in druí dán i&ndot;gnad do thurcbail i nHerind. Cinnas dana ón or in rí &ersir; cia ó ngenend &ersir; cia bale i &ndot;genfe. Dán bas chomgráid frit grádso ol in druí. &ersir; bid is tigseo genfes. &ersir; bid ón mnai út tall do brathar genfes. Is torrach &ersir; beraid mac innossa &ersir; bid comgráid fritso. &ersir; ticfa grád amra aile and bas úasliu dia
fogenat for &ndot;gradasi .i. grad ecalsi.

Ra firad trá uili anísin Ra genair in mac fo chetóir. &ersir; ro thríall in rí a marbad in meic. coro thairmisc a athair .i. Ollom ar níba lia in rí is taig andaside. In tan ro bas ocond imrádud imme co cualatar in mac oca rád. Domurcbaid súas coro acilliur in ríg.
Turggbair suas iar sin. Ní damsa dot inchaib a &Fdot;iachrai or se. Cid dober duit ar in rí. Ni handsa. Mo bruig mo lánamuin lonchore co ndabaig dandlugae tucthar om ríg mucra escra. ‖ cuach carpat calg tricha bó bró fíann fiacho. O &Fdot;iachna damsa insin uile ar in mac. Doberthar ar Fiachu. Cia ainm regas arin macsa
i fectsa. Tabar Aí fair ar in drui. Conid assain trá ro ainmniged aí airchetail .i. ó Aí mac Olloman. &ersir; is sí sein aí cetaerbairt Aí mac Olloman.

Morand i&mmacr; mac Carpri Chind Chait. Is de ro labrastarsede .i. ro marbtha lasin Corpre hísin cech soerchland ro boí i nHerind.
Ar ba di athechthuathaib Herend dó. &ersir; ro gab rige &ndot;Herend ar ecin. &ersir; rap olc a rige ar ní bíd acht óengranne i cind cecha dési. &ersir; oendircu a ccind na cuslindi. &ersir; oendircu i mmulluch na darach ina re. Ructha tri meic don Chairpriu hísin. &ersir; ro bádidís leis fo

chetoir. ar ba doig ropdís torathair. Fo bíthin no bitis a cathbairr
fo cennaib. In tres mac rucad dó .i. Morand. Ro thriall in cétna do denam fris .i. a bádud. Ro herbad da oclach leis da chur i mbeolu na tuinne. Ora laiset uadib é i tuind mara brissis in tond in cathbarr &ersir; tócbaid in tond uasa in mac co n-accatar a gnúis for barr na tuinne. Is and asbertsom. Garg bé tond ar in mac.
Fole&ndot;gat chuce na ocláig &ersir; dofocbat súas. Nacham turcbaid ar seseom. Úar bé gáeth. Cid dogenam din macsa ar indara fer. Dogenam ar in fer aile facbam é i téig ar beind chloche i ndorus tige na cerda .i. Máen a ainmside cerd ind ríg. &ersir; cométam in mac dús in lessaigfe in cerd é. O dochuaidside assa thig co n-acca in
mac isin téig. &ersir; no mbeir leis isin tech. Fursain caindel a ben ar se. co n-acther in frithisea fuarusa. Tucad cucu iar sin caindel conid and atbert Morand. Solus bé caindell. Ro alt in mac la Moen iar sin fora ⋅eilb féin. Rofetatar i&mmacr; na oclaig út narbo lesseom in mac.

Fecht and iarum dolluid Carpre do ól lenna do thig Moín. In tráth rop ániu doib oc ól. luid in mac as cach ucht i n-araile co ndechaid i n-ucht Chairpri. Ro mainigther in gein ar Carpre. Cóich in macsa la osnaid móir do chur. Focheird dano a máthair in meic .i. ben Charpri osnaid aile. Cid itáid ar Móen. in format
nofar geib. Cid inmain lemsa in mac &ersir; cid mac dam ropad &fdot;err lem combad libsi é. ara mét far serce lim. &ersir; ara riachtain a lessa duib. Ni tharla tra aní hísein dúinni ar Carpre. Maith ém a Chorpri ar in dias oclach út ropad maith a lúag neich dobérad duit mac amlaid. Ropad maith im&mmacr; ar Carpre. Ro beraind a
chomthrom de argut dara chend. &ersir; ropad trian de ór. Acht ni tarba a rád ar is erlabra dímaín a ndogníd. Amal bid oca no bemmís ar na ocláech fonaiscther fort so. Fonaiscther fair. Oro naidmed fair fole&ndot;gat na óclaig cuce co tucsat in mac ina ucht. &ersir; coro dilsigset dó. Is é in macsa ar siat rucsam uait dia bádud.
&ersir; iss ed so daronsam de. Is fír uile ar in cerd. Is desin tra ro bai mac Main fairseom. &ersir; it e sin teora briathra toesecha ro ráid Morand iarna genemain fo chetóir .i. garg bé tond. úar bé gaeth. Solus bé caindel.

Gabais tra Morand ardbrithemnacht Herend iar sin. &ersir; ba
marb a athairseom .i. Cairpre. &ersir; ro &fdot;aidseom a mac co Feradach Find Fechtnach i crích nAlban dia thócuriud i rríge &ndot;Herend ar ro theichside ria Corpriu dar muir innund arnaro marbtha leiss. Co tanicside fo gairmseom. &ersir; corra gab ardríge Herend Ocus Morand i n-ardbrithemnacht Herend. &ersir; ‖
